dialogues.speaker: THE SOUND OF THE AIR RAID ALARM IS REVERBERATING THROUGH
dialogues.text: AIR. NINE-YEAR-OLD KITAI has stopped playing in his room. moves the hair from his eyes. He looks out and sees the walkway outside. This is an apartment only two floors fro the ground. He sees his sister SENSHI, 19, running along the walkway moving people hurriedly. Nine-year-old Kitai sits frightened. Senshi returns to th apartment. She is a young Ranger. She is in uniform, hold a cutlass. She looks to her little brother.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: Kit, we have to go. Right now.

dialogues.speaker: SUDDENLY THERE IS A LOUD TERRIFYING SCREECHING SOUND
dialogues.text: CREATURE SOUND. Nine-year-old Kitai covers his ears.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Is that..?

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: They surprised us. Sent ships. Dropped those things. You’re not afraid, are you?

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: No... Yes. ANOTHER SHRIEK. CLOSER. No way he’s not afraid of that so

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: Kit, get under the bed. Nine-year-old Kitai does as his sister says. Senshi’s eye search her little brother’s room. She sees a rectangular glass box with plants in it. It is covered. She finds a remote on the table. She presses a button. The lid opens closes. Senshi straps her cutlass expertly to her back. It magnetically sticks. She pulls all the plants out of the glass case. She pulls the case across the floor and turns on its side. She shoves it under the bed with Kitai.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: Climb in here, okay? It won’t be able to smell you. Nine-year-old Kitai does as he’s told. She hands him the remote. She hands him an extra cutlass from her bag.  AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 2. Senshi grabs her little brother's face. Her beautiful eye are emotional and dead serious.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: Don’t come out. No matter what. That’s an order. Nine-year-old Kitai nods, eyes filling with water.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Sens-- ANOTHER SCREECH, THIS TIME MUCH CLOSER. Senshi hits the remote in Kitai’s hands. The glass box closes. Nine-year-old Kitai watches his sister stand. She pulls the cutlass from her back. Her fingers tap a patter the cutlass’s handle that reads, “Cutlass C-6.” The cutla thousands of steel-like fibers extend on either side into razor-sharp points. The cutlass is now six feet long.

dialogues.speaker: APARTMENT.
dialogues.text: Senshi moves into the other room. She spins the cutlass i her hand. Senshi is partially obscured by our view from under the b WE SEE THE CREATURE ENTER OFF THE WALKWAY. We just get a glimpse of its enormous, six-legged body as enters the apartment. We get a glimpse of Senshi nervously moving around in the room, staring at it. Senshi moves forward bravely. Tries strike it. Furniture gets thrown in the room. Senshi expertly wields cutlass. She gets hidden momentarily from our view throug the doorway. WE SEE THE CREATURE’S ARM REACH OUT. Senshi parkours off the corner of the room away from it. And then we see Senshi get struck. Nine-year-old Kitai’s face contorts in terror. Senshi is thrown across the room. Senshi is dazed. She tr to stand. She screams as the creature descends on her. Sh obscured from sight by its huge body. Kitai taps a pattern on the handle of the cutlass in his hands. It extends, razor-sharp at the ends.  AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 3. He is terrified as he clutches the weapon. He doesn’t mov from his hiding place. Tears stream down Kitai’s face. The creature POUNCES AGAIN, then it’s on her, and Kitai h her VOICE, no longer a Ranger, but a girl --

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Dad... When the creature moves, we see Senshi’s bloodied, still in the corner of the room. There is the movement of people outside on the walkway. T creature strangely grabs Senshi’s lifeless body and holds up against the window of the apartment. We hear the group outside the apartment start screaming in terror. The creature looks around and moves after the people outs Nine-year-old Kitai stares at the body of his sister. Her mangled face stares back at him.

dialogues.speaker: MATCH TO
dialogues.text: INT. KITAI’S BEDROOM - DAWN A futuristic alarm goes off. KITAI RAIGE groggily gets up. He is fourteen years old no Small for his age. He rubs his hands over his buzzed short hair. It is still dark outside. He looks at a holographic picture on his desk. It is a fa picture. A nine-year-old Kitai, his father, mother, and t fifteen-year-old Senshi. Kitai gets up. He touches his hand to the figure of Sensh His fingers go a little through the hologram. Kitai starts putting on some kind of futuristic fatigues. is just becoming light outside the windows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thirty sets of legs SPRINTING through the gorgeous red an sandstone terrain. A junior military unit - THE RANGER CADETS - Thirty-two teenage boys, in four teams of eight, dressed identically.  AFTER EARTH Revised Salmon 5/9/12 4. REVEAL: Kitai strides ruggedly at the center of the pack, SMALLER THAN THE OTHERS. For their every one stride, Kita has to take two. He’s nearly SPRINTING, just to pace. A huge river cuts through a stunning red mountain range. Immediately we notice something strange. There is - A LARGE PLANET NEARBY and a larger sun eating away at a smaller sun. Superimpose: NOVA PRIME: Human Settlement YEAR: 1000 A.E. We push in close on Kitai running at full gait. SWEATING.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: There were twelve billion people living on Earth on October 23rd, 2071 - the day Mother Earth turned against us.

dialogues.speaker: ARCHIVE FOOTAGE.
dialogues.text: Screams. Panic in the streets.

dialogues.speaker: EARTH
dialogues.text: The archive footage is from varying sources. Newsreel, security cameras, amateur cell-phone video as the world's major cities are rocked by:

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Sudden and drastic changes in the atmosphere, the water table, and food supply. All becoming lethally toxic. Rendering the planet uninhabitable. Billions perished in the following months. And, by 2077, Earth’s human population was zero. A third-world village - toxic river - cattle, hippos, and other lifeless creatures float ominously downstream. A ha team stands on the river's edge.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 5 AFTER EARTH Revised Goldenrod 4/2/12 4a.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KITAI RUNNING. He must finish first. His size, his family history. Second place feels like death. He’s that determi  AFTER EARTH Revised Salmon 5/9/12 5-5A. The company runs past a GROWING STATION -- a huge, open- fabric structure that shields crops. Kitai pushes through crowd, BUMPING his way up, nearing the leader - BO - a sixteen-year-old, freakishly perfect physical specimen. Despite Kitai’s lack of size and strength, he muscles to front. Bo sidles up beside him, all seriousness--

dialogues.speaker: BO
dialogues.text: This isn’t a race, Cadet! * But Kitai isn’t listening -- he’s only SPEEDING UP, leavi the company behind, sprinting for a finish line that isn’ there, in fifth gear when everyone else is in second --

dialogues.speaker: ARCHIVE FOOTAGE
dialogues.text: Poisoned water. Bacteria multiplying. Russian citizens ch on the air in a rural town. Cars jammed on the 405 FREEWA Humans flee in terror as ACID RAIN blisters their skin.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: The founding of the United Ranger * Corps, one thousand years ago, was * a global military effort - an * evacuation of Earth. *

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 7 ARCHIVE FOOTAGE: Members of a multi-national force bein up ramps into the bellies of MASSIVE, ARK-STYLE SPACESHIP assembled on an airfield at an Antarctic military base.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: The world's greatest minds united with the single mission... preserve humanity.

dialogues.speaker: 8A OMIT 8A
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Salmon 5/9/12 6.

dialogues.speaker: THE TESTING BOOTH RESEMBLES AN OLD-SCHOOL PICTURE BOOTH.
dialogues.text: IS FUTURISTIC TEST TAKING. A supersized, picture-booth-li environment. Kitai sits responding to computer-generated questions presented in front of him in HOLOGRAPHIC form. We realize this is from where Kitai has been speaking.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: The expedition took more than one hundred Earth years.  11 12 13 AFTER EARTH Revised Salmon 5/9/12 7. ARCHIVE FOOTAGE: An older Asian woman shoots video from a spacecraft's window. We see that familiar blue-green marb as we look back on Earth from space.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: The Rangers would lead the settlement of mankind's new home... Nova Prime. WE SEE FOOTAGE OF THE FIRST RANGERS scouting in the alien terrain like a latter-day Lewis & Clark. THERE ARE COCOON

dialogues.speaker: RANGERS PUTTING FABRIC OVER THESE TO MAKE COVERED STRUCTU
dialogues.text: We see footage of a colony embedded in honeycomb structur in the ridge of a reddish rocky landscape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai nervously awaits his next computerized instruction.

dialogues.speaker: HOLOGRAPHIC INSTRUCTOR, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Section Two. First Contact - 243 A.E. The holographic imagery changes to: ARCHIVE: Newsreel and amateur footage of DARK SHADOWS appearing over the colony. An armada of ALIEN SHIPS loomi ominously overhead.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: The enemy made no attempt to communicate. SHAKY FOOTAGE OF THE ALIEN FLEET ATTACKING. Laying the hu colonies to waste in a massive Pearl Harbor-style attack.
12 13  14 AFTER EARTH Revised Salmon 5/9/12 8-8B.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Each CADET, with their “training staff,” now dons a speci HELMET. They are staring down an ominous narrow rock cany

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: The Rangers were now called upon solely as warriors.

dialogues.speaker: CADETS
dialogues.text: Go! Go! Go! Gol... The Cadets march forward, in razor formation. Above them, the RIM, are the R.I.’s. They monitor the cadets’ “fear diamonds” on SMART FABRIC. Kitai is in the middle of the pack -- his head on a swive From the corner of his eye, he spots -- A FLASH, by a nearby rock. A slight disturbance in the ai Could be nothing. But to Kitai, it’s everything.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Left! Left! I got it!

dialogues.speaker: BO
dialogues.text: Cadet! Fall back into formation! ! The rock DE-CAMO’S -- it’s the R.I. Kitai expertly wields training staff in battle. Crazy skills. But then -- A SCR HORIZONTALLY SLIDES ACROSS KITAI’S VISION. He’s blinded.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I’m dark! I’m dark! Heavy breathing; sound dopplering... then -- KITAI’S SCRIM RETRACTS -- and standing in front of him is THE R.I. -- He WHACKS Kitai clean on the noggin with his PAD. Kitai FALLS BACKWARDS... but then SPRINGS BACK UP WI CAT-LIKE AGILITY! It is Kitai that is now landing the blo but it’s all a bit too fast and fancy -- his overzealousn gets him POPPED again. Kitai is down. As the R.I. moves i R.I. You're out. You’re out. But Kitai refuses to be submitted. He uses all his might squirms out of a submission. Then-- THE R.I. PUTS HIS FOOT ON KITAI’S NECK. GAME OVER. 14

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 15 16 17 AFTER EARTH Revised Salmon 5/9/12 8C-8D.

dialogues.speaker: YOU. ARE. OUT
dialogues.text: The rest of Kitai’s team are now surrounded by R.I.’s -- result of Kitai breaking formation.

dialogues.speaker: R.I., (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ALL of you -- out! As Kitai pushes to his feet, his fellow cadets click forw to the next exercise. Kitai gathers himself, follows them

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: ARCHIVE FOOTAGE: SKREL SHIPS smoking in ruins on a desert floor. SKREL SHIPS in retreat.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: The enemy created the most vicious killing machine humanity has ever faced.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: ANOTHER BATTLEFIELD: More shaky-cam footage as what look METEORS rain down from the sky, cratering into the earth. Then, emerging from the smoking craters, SAVAGE, SIX-LEGG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE UP: Kitai. The camera pans around, revealing: A HOLOGRAPHIC IMAGE OF AN URSA.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: The Ursa was genetically engineered to hunt and kill humans. The enemy studied us, attempting to discover a single common denominator held by all human beings. They determined it was fear. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 18 19 AFTER EARTH Revised Salmon 5/9/12

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The Ursa is technically blind, but sees humans based on the pheromones we secrete when frightened. They literally smell our fear. Once an Ursa imprints on an individual, it will hunt that person until death. Kitai looks intently at the faceless, six-legged creature

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Humankind was again in danger of extinction. And again, turned to the Rangers for the answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai strangely begins to smile. Almost beaming.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: That answer came in the form of the Prime Commander, Cypher Raige, the Original Ghost and first human to single-handedly kill an Ursa. He is an anomaly. THE URSA CANNOT SEE HIM. He is believed to be so completely free from fear, that to an Ursa... he is invisible. This phenomena is known as Ghosting. As Kitai speaks, we see ARCHIVAL FOOTAGE of the great Cyp Raige in action, captured by a fellow Ranger’s HELMET-CAM

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 18 19 +e HH HF

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Salmon 5/9/12 10-10B. 20 21 22

dialogues.speaker: BEING STRAPPED WITH EQUIPMENT FOR BATTLE, LIKE ACHILLES
dialogues.text: PREPARING FOR WAR. CYPHER’S EYES SETTLE ON THE PERSON HOL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holographic Cypher and six other Rangers posed heroically

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Today there are Seven Ghosts. They * are the elite members of the United * Ranger Corps. *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON BO -- strong and agile, expertly climbing the rock fac He senses something, looks down at -- * KITAI, gaining on him, fast! He’s FREE CLIMBING. *

dialogues.speaker: BO
dialogues.text: Cadet, click into harness! *

dialogues.speaker: KITAIL
dialogues.text: (as he climbs) * Slows me down! * They reach the peak, and Kitai glimpses THE SPOT just bel the top. He’s on a six-inch LEDGE with a FACE that now TI out -- more than 90 degrees -- into space. This requires every climber’s biggest fear... COMMITMENT TO THE VOID -- Kitai finds his best right HANDHOLD, and SWINGS OUT, HANG 500 feet above the canyon below -- He SWINGS AGAIN, and A -- with enough MOMENTUM to THROW HIS WEIGHT OVER AND PULL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai exhales. Exhilarated. On top of the world. Kitai smiles, checks his time.  AFTER EARTH Revised Salmon 5/9/12 11.

dialogues.speaker: BO
dialogues.text: That was stupid.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: They don’t give statues for being scared.

dialogues.speaker: BO
dialogues.text: Yeah, but they do give plenty of headstones for being dead! Kitai’s already hooked onto a futuristic zip-line. He disappears over the other side of the hill. Bo clips on a follows.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 23 24 25 AFTER EARTH Revised Salmon 5/9/12 12.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai and Bo ZIP-LINE towards the plateau. Even when zip- lining, Kitai seems to be racing. We catch glimpses of beautiful Nova Prime as they ZIP past. Undulating structu in the canyon; windmill-type towers and waterwheels; an airfield with ships in the distance. A stunning human accomplishment. Then --

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Cypher Raige is considered the greatest warrior in the history of the United Rangers Corps. He is responsible for the first true era of peace in nearly eight hundred years.

dialogues.speaker: KITALI
dialogues.text: Oral history section complete.

dialogues.speaker: TESTING COMPUTER
dialogues.text: Please state name. Beat. We see his eyes blaze with meaning as he says...

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: Kitai Raige. 23 24 25 a  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 13.

dialogues.speaker: HOLOGRAPHIC INSTRUCTOR, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Cadet Raige. Fear Simulation and analysis...

dialogues.speaker: OMIT 26
dialogues.text: 27 28 AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 14.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. KITAI’S BEDROOM - NIGHT 28 Kitai sits on his bed. A well-preserved, ancient book sit his lap. There is a wind-catching fabric outside his wind that moves as the wind shifts direction. FAIA RAIGE steps into the room and sits in a chair. She i woman in her forties with eyes that can look right throug you. She has clearly come from work. She has dust on her coat.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: A lot of spikes today. We had a lot of orographic uplifts - what are orographic uplifts?

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: The vertical forcing of air by terrain features like mountains or something.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: Good. One day when you’re done running around and shooting things you’1l take over the turbine research division for me.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Sure, Mom.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: How’d the test go? Kitai looks up.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: I’1l find out tomorrow. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revised Pink 1/26/12 15.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: It’ll be great when I tell the General I got into the Ranger Program on Senshi’s birthday. That’‘ll be great, right?

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: Not everyone gets into the Ranger program on their first try.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Yeah, but those guys are bums. Beat. Faia smiles.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: Yes, he’1ll be happy. She sees the book in his hands.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: When did you start reading that?

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I’m trying to get done before the General gets home. Is he staying here this time?

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: If he wants. Kitai smiles. He looks at the book. We see the tattered c says, “Moby Dick.” Beat.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: There’s lines underlined. Does that mean the General and Senshi liked these parts?

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: I don’t know.

dialogues.speaker: KITALI
dialogues.text: Maybe I should memorize one? Do you think he'd like that?

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: I think he’1l like the fact that you're reading the book.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Are we doing a cake?  29 30 AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 16.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: We're not doing a cake. We’1ll just be together. Kitai nods that that makes sense and returns to his book.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: I’m going to wash off all this dust, I’ve been on the ridge all day. Faia watches him sadly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Results day: Kitai sits on a bench surrounded by the ston frieze carved in the wall. He sits beneath his father’s i on the wall. He gets up and moves towards the tube-like elevators that down into the ground. He joins other cadets that are gett on the elevators.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are down in the honeycomb-shaped caverns. Kitai and tw other cadets, including BO, as focused and present as eve and RAYNA, a pretty fifteen-year-old, line the hallway standing at attention. Kitai is indeed young and small compared to the others, a full head shorter than Rayna.

dialogues.speaker: BO
dialogues.text: I heard everyone nailed the history and no one passed the VR.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Wait. You didn’t? Bo shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: BO
dialogues.text: Spiders.

dialogues.speaker: BO/KITAI, (SIMUL)
dialogues.text: I hate spiders. They bump elbows.  31 AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 17.

dialogues.speaker: BO
dialogues.text: What was the point of spiders? What function? I just don’t get it.

dialogues.speaker: RAYNA
dialogues.text: I heard they captured an Ursa. Both boys’ heads swivel--

dialogues.speaker: BO/KITAI
dialogues.text: What? No way. Alive? Who?

dialogues.speaker: RAYNA
dialogues.text: Who do you think. The Ghosts. And they’re going to move it. And study it. As this sinks in a CADET exits the office of COMMANDER VE He’s got a new cutlass, a C-6 model. We hear...

dialogues.speaker: COMMANDER VELAN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Raige! Kitai turns sharply and enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai stands at attention in front of VELAN'S desk. This is a no-nonsense military instructor. A set of cutlasses stand on a rack by his desk. A few of the racks are empty from ones he’s given out. COMMANDER VELAN scans through a series of holographic documents.

dialogues.speaker: COMMANDER VELAN
dialogues.text: Your test scores are very impressive. Kitai looks on nervously.

dialogues.speaker: COMMANDER VELAN
dialogues.text: You've got a Ranger's mind. No doubt in that. It takes all Kitai has not to scream for joy. Commander V looks at Kitai, considering. There is compassion in the commander’s eyes. 31  AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 18.

dialogues.speaker: COMMANDER VELAN
dialogues.text: But, I'm not advancing you this year.

dialogues.speaker: COMMANDER VELAN
dialogues.text: You take unnecessary risks. You confuse courage with recklessness. You may try again next year. Kitai is devastated.

dialogues.speaker: COMMANDER VELAN
dialogues.text: Dismissed. Kitai's holographic folder disappears and Commander Velan prepares for the next cadet. KITAI DOES NOT MOVE. Command Velan looks back up from his desk.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (nearly hyperventilating)

dialogues.speaker: VELAN
dialogues.text: Denied. Commander Velan steadies his eyes on Kitai with a caution scowl. Kitai misreads this pause as permission.

dialogues.speaker: COMMANDER VELAN
dialogues.text: I understand what it’s like to see someone die, I know what that does to you. Kitai steadies himself. He is near tears.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Sir, my father is returning home tonight. Today’s a special day for our family. I haven’t seen him... And I HAVE to be able to tell him that I have advanced to Phase Two. (pleading) I have got to be able to tell him that I am a Ranger, sir.  AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 18A. Commander Velan studies Kitai. Then...  32 AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 19.

dialogues.speaker: COMMANDER VELAN
dialogues.text: You tell your father that I said, “Welcome Home." Commander Velan looks down at his work. When he looks up, Kitai is still standing there. Almost belligerently.

dialogues.speaker: COMMANDER VELAN
dialogues.text: (definitively) Your lessons in discipline begin right now. You may leave this room with dignity and decorum befitting a cadet. Kitai is heartbroken. He turns sharply and exits.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. RAIGE LIVING STRUCTURE - KITCHEN — DUSK 32 The Raige apartment is in one of the curved towers that l out over the beautiful city. From the living room window, see A STUNNING VIEW OF THE NEARBY PLANET AND STRANGE TWO SUNS. The table is set for family dinner. Kitai and Faia sit at table in silence. Kitai is in full Academy formal attire. Faia turns to the open landing of the apartment.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: Did you notice that? The wind shifted.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: To the northwest. We see the distant smart fabric sails outside the buildin shifting towards the wind. THERE IS THE SOUND OF MOVEMENT OUTSIDE. Faia gets to her feet, as does Kitai. He stands at attention.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: How are my lines? She looks at his uniform.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: Your lines are perfect. (beat) How are my lines?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 33 AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 19A.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Mom. She heads out, into:

dialogues.speaker: LIVING ROOM
dialogues.text: Faia opens the front door to reveal CYPHER RAIGE, still i dress uniform and carrying his kit bag. He is handsome wi intense eyes, older than in the film footage. For a momen neither of them say anything.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Faia. 33  AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 20.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: Hi. There's a lot of baggage here. Cypher sees Kitai standing attention. Cypher sets his bag down, looks at his son.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: You've grown.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Sir, Cadet Raige reports. Cypher does not respond. Nods, as if to say, “Okay let’s this.” He takes a slow, deliberate three-hundred-and-sixt degree walk around Kitai. A MILITARY INSPECTION. Cypher closes the distance and stops directly in front of Kitai.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (no emotion) Your collar’s ragged. You have a crease on your right pant leg, but not your left. Fold crease. Cypher gives Faia a look over this offense. She stares ba

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Your jacket is improperly fastened. * Before you present yourself for inspection, Cadet, square yourself in the mirror. Is that understood?

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: Yes, sir.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: But... this isn’t an inspection. Cypher gives Kitai an awkward pat on the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher, Faia, and Kitai sit at the table having a silent family meal.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: So, how were finals? * Cypher looks to Faia. *

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: How were finals? *  AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 20A. Kitai glances at his mother, then looks down.  AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I wasn’t advanced to Ranger.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Where do we look when we speak? Kitai now makes eye contact with his father.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I was not advanced to Ranger.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: You were not advanced to Ranger... He leans forward listening for the additional --

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I was not advanced to Ranger, sir.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: That’s all right. You're young.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: I ran the canyon eleven seconds faster than you did.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Well, if you were ready, Velan would’ve promoted you. He’s a good man. Knows his stuff. You weren’t ready. Cypher returns to his food. Faia is actively GLARING at Kitai stares at his plate. Then --

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: I’m not hungry. I’m going to my room. Cypher’s voice is quiet.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Are you asking me or telling me?

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: May I go to my room, sir?

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Denied. Sit down. 21. him. Kitai sits down. Faia can’t believe how mean Cypher is be

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: May I be excused, General?  35 36 AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 22. Cypher says nothing. Faia stands and leaves the dining ar Beat. Cypher stares off. Kitai sits there against his wil

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (to Kitai) ...-You’re excused. Kitai leaves. Cypher is left alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher in the guest room, which is part guest room, part shrine to Senshi. His bag and cutlass are next to him. Pictures of family move and float on a smart fabric wall. Cypher leans forward and touches Senshi -- THE FABRIC WAL INSTANTLY FILLS WITH PICTURES OF SENSHI. She is laughing playing. And the General is watching, armored-up, his eye clinical. Some of the pictures have icons with them. He i not impervious. Cypher reaches up and hits an icon next t picture of Senshi in a Ranger uniform... Her image is in holographic form next to him. At a Ranger cadet ceremony. People are cheering in the background. We hear her name called. She walks forward. PASSES THROUGH CYPHER. And his ARMOR FALLS and the father is suddenly vulnerable. And he can’t take it. Momentarily losing it. the hologram, she walks forward to a platform, an award i pinned to her uniform. Cypher struggles for control. As he rises find THE GENERA reflected in the window, a mirror at night. Behind him THE CROWD CHEERS SENSHI. A drill routine with cutlass. Senshi is amazing with it. He turns and watches beloved daughter.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. FAIA’S OFFICE ROOM - LATER THAT NIGHT Faia is hunched over a table with holographic wind turbin She moves them with her hands and writes down calculation the holographic turbines spin. From the pictures and diagrams on the walls of the office can see Faia is a wind scientist. Cypher enters the room, sits down next to her. She turns, looks into his eyes. 35 36

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 23.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: Look at that... Yep. Cypher’s back. General Raige had him hostage. She smiles and it’s genuine. He takes her hand.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: I have a last mission to Iphitos. Flying tomorrow. And after it’s completed, I’m announcing my retirement.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: Retirement?

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: That’s it. It’s that time.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: No, it is most definitely not that time. He’s forgotten that she often surprises him and then he’s surprised when she does it again. He takes her hands again. Looks deeply in her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: I want my family back. I want you back. He takes out a necklace, antique jewelry from old Earth. incredibly rare and symbolic, but she just looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: That boy in there is trying to find you. He is... a feeling boy, he’s an intuitive boy, and I... He watched you read that book with Senshi, his entire life. He’s reading that book now. He’s reaching for you... Don’t get me wrong -- I respect everything that you’ve done... but you have a son in there that you do not know. He is drowning, and he does not need a Commanding Officer. He needs a father.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: We fight monsters. And before that, we learn how to fight them. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revised Yellow 2/24/12

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And before that, we dream about killing them. That is who we are and it is my responsibility to instill that into that boy. 23A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 37 38 AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 24.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: Oh look, the General’s back.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: You’re damn right he is.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: Let me make a prediction: when the General is old and no longer looks like his statue, the father is going to realize this is the exact moment he lost his son. He turns and walks out. She sees that he’s left the neckl behind and its cold stones shimmer like distant stars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai sits alone in his bedroom. His uniform is crumpled the bed. He is in civilian clothes. Cypher enters the room. Kitai becomes still. Cypher sits across from him. They stare at each other. The silence is uneasy. The silence is broken as Cypher says:

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Pack your bags. You’re coming with me to Iphitos. We depart at second sun. His face fills with disbelief. THE ROAR OF FUSION-POWERED ENGINES OVERTAKES US.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nova Prime's central military hub. The MAIN HANGAR is a h cavernous, fabric structure, big enough to house several TRANSPORT SHIPS for loading and unloading. Kitai is a kid in a candy store. He watches a sleek TRANS SHIP being fueled. A few yards away Cypher stands with Fa An aide, LT. ALVAREZ, 40s, war-movie handsome, approaches 37 38  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 25.

dialogues.speaker: ALVAREZ
dialogues.text: Good morning, General. (to Faia) Ma'am. (back to Cypher) Your ship had maintenance issues. We've got you on the Hesper, sir. Runway two-seven. It's only a Class- B Ranger and cargo transport, but if you give me another hour...

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: That will be fine, Lieutenant. Alvarez smiles like a kid meeting his favorite rock star.

dialogues.speaker: ALVAREZ
dialogues.text: Yes, sir. The boys on board are pretty excited to rub elbows with the 0.G. I'll see you on board, sir.

dialogues.speaker: ALVAREZ
dialogues.text: The Original Ghost. Alvarez exits, leaving Cypher and Faia alone. Awkward silence. They watch as Lt. Alvarez approaches and shakes hands with Kitai. Faia and Cypher look back to one anothe The silence is broken by: A LOUD BANG. Cypher instinctively GRABS FAIA'S WRIST AND PLACES HER BE HIM. They realize the noise came from someone who had dropped large, wrench-like metal tool. He gives an apologetic loo Faia looks down at Cypher's hand on her arm. She smiles a she looks up at Cypher. Always the protector. Cypher gent releases her arm. They look into one another's eyes.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA DELICATELY REMOVES HER SCARF, REVEALING THE ANTIQUE
dialogues.text: NECKLACE. The significance of the gesture registers in Cypher’s expression. He’s getting a second chance with hi wife. Faia smiles, bittersweet. They embrace.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI'S POINT OF VIEW
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 26. Kitai watches his parents. He smiles in joyous amazement. Then, his attention is drawn to an OVERSIZED, ORGANIC-LOO POD being carefully loaded into the aft cargo ramp of the Hesper. The pod is large enough to house a Ford Explorer. Kitai is riveted to the procession and is startled by RAY

dialogues.speaker: RAYNA
dialogues.text: Okay. I’m jealous. I admit it.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: ‘Cause I get to do Lightstream * Travel? *

dialogues.speaker: RAYNA
dialogues.text: Because you get to travel with your dad. He’s completely hot.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: Right -- * BACK WITH FAIA who catches Cypher watching Kitai and Rayn sharing an easy moment.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Who's that grown-up hitting on our kid?

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: Now, now. (beat; then) This was a really good decision. Now go make some good memories together. Faia is now walking toward Rayna and Kitai. *

dialogues.speaker: RAYNA
dialogues.text: So, um, I'll watch you take off * from the tower, okay? * Rayna moves off. Faia reaches Kitai and gives him a hug.

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: (sotto) Take it easy on your father. He's a little rusty. Kitai heads to his father, backpack slung over his should

dialogues.speaker: RANGER, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Stand me up!  AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 26A. Kitai, Cypher, and Alvarez turn to see a Ranger veteran i wheelchair being taken to a medical transport ship. He is a magnetic chair that hovers above the ground. He has two attendants with him. The Ranger veteran stares at Cypher.  39 AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 27.

dialogues.speaker: RANGER IN CHAIR
dialogues.text: General Raige, I was on the Plateau. You saved me and four others. And I just came from seeing my baby girl’s face for the first time. (to attendants) Stand me up.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: That's not necessary, Ranger.

dialogues.speaker: RANGER IN CHAIR
dialogues.text: (to attendants) Damn it, stand me up. The two attendants reluctantly help the Ranger out of his chair. They have to support him. He has one leg amputated is shaking, but is held up by the attendants’ strong arms The trembling Ranger raises his hand and smartly salutes. Cypher snaps to attention and salutes back. FIND KITAI watching his father, seeing the respect confer And feel Kitai’s longing and need for such a look himself The Ranger's eyes fill with tears. Cypher nods to him tha it's okay and then moves to him and helps him back into h chair. Cypher whispers something comforting we can’t hear into the soldier’s ear. Very moved, Kitai watches as the soldier is led to his medical transport. Alvarez punches up data on a SMART FABRIC SCREEN. Cypher Kitai walk across the hangar to the runway - and, we now realize, the SAME TRANSPORT SHIP we saw the heavy, organi looking pod being brought aboard earlier. Kitai is intrig as he watches the pod travel up the ramp and disappear in the belly of the transport ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The heavy transport ship Hesper rockets into the sky. It passes over the wind turbines and the fabric structures o Nova Prime's city. This world of curved, flowing structures and honeycomb- spotted areas of rock recedes into a mist as the ship asc into orbit.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 40 41 42 AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 28.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The transport ship hurtles past us, headed into the stars leaving Nova Prime far behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A LOW HUM and low light as the ship travels. Kitai looks the window. Then at his father who is oblivious, scanning mission dossier.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I’m reading Moby Dick. Now Cypher looks up, looks at his son.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Your mother told me. (beat, half-hearted) That’s great. This isn’t going to be easy for Cypher. They are interrup by the INTERCOM --

dialogues.speaker: PILOT, (OVER INTERCOM)
dialogues.text: Nav-Com has us arriving at Iphitos in twenty-two hours. The cabin lights all DIM. Kitai wants to talk more, but Cypher cuts it off--

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: I’m gonna grab some rack. Recommend you do the same. He switches off his light and rolls over. Kitai mimics hi father, but as the camera finds him again, he’s WIDE AWAK too excited to even think about sleeping. Then the camera finds Cypher, awake with his thoughts, to

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 40 41 42  43 44 AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 29.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone is asleep. There is only THE HUM OF THE SHIP. Cy and Alvarez sleep in their seats. RANGERS SLEEP ON THEIR BACKS, CUTLASSES ON THEIR CHESTS. Kitai quietly unbuckles, rises. He makes his way down the center aisle past row upon row of sleeping soldiers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai comes out of the bathroom and looks to the rear of ship. He knows that the large pod he saw earlier is only meters away. He sees a sign that says: RESTRICTED AREA. DO NOT ENTER. HAZARDOUS CARGO. Kitai hesitates, looks back to the passenger compartment, then turns and breaches the security area. Kitai heads ominously down a small flight of metal stairs into the belly of the ship. It's creepy down here. Dark a quiet, nothing but the distant HUM OF THE SHIP. At the en a narrow walkway a HEAVY MESH FABRIC is drawn, obscuring lies beyond. Kitai gingerly makes his way toward it. He pulls back the fabric a little and peeks inside. The ship's cavernous CA HOLD is dark and mysterious, all we see are shadowy glimp of that ORGANIC-LOOKING POD. As Kitai peers into the darkness he is SUDDENLY GRABBED. face of a GRUFF MILITARY OFFICER emerging from the shadow his hand around Kitai's arm.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: Can you read? Kitai just looks at him, frozen.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: I said, can you read?

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (defiantly) Yes, sir. 43 44  45 AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 30.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: There's a sign back there - “Authorized Personnel Only" - why didn't you read that?

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (looking past him) What's in there? Kitai looks over to see some of the pod's SECURITY DETAIL seated around a tabletop, playing A VIRTUAL GAME.

dialogues.speaker: MCQUARRIE
dialogues.text: Might wanna go easy on him, Sarge. That's the Prime Commander’s son right there. The Chief looks back at Kitai, surprised.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: You're Raige's kid? Kitai sticks his chest out to look tougher. Kitai glances toward the organic-looking pod. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: KITALI
dialogues.text: (louder) What's in there? With a whole new attitude to Kitai, now that he knows who father is, the Chief steps aside to give him a better loo With a showman's conspiratorial grin, like a carnival bar

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: You wanna see?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher has his head leaned against the glass of the windo His eyes slowly open. THE HUM OF THE SHIP CONTINUES. Cyph pulls his head away from the glass. He looks out the wind curious. There is nothing but darkness outside. Cypher pu the back of his hand against the glass. HIS RING TOUCHES THE REINFORCED GLASS.

dialogues.speaker: AUDIBLE, HIGH-PITCHED TONE.
dialogues.text: 46 AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 31. Cypher, with a look of a razor-sharp soldier, turns to Kitai's empty seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai takes a step toward the rear of the oversized pod, his nerves get the better of him.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: +.-an Ursa? (beat) A dead one? The Chief just shakes his head. Kitai's eyes go wide.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: This is one of three we caught. We * keep all three on Iphitos, away from the civilian population. This * one we call Viper. This one’s the * biggest and meanest. * (beat) You want to see if you can ghost? Some of the other Rangers look up with interest.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: The pod is bio-structural organic armor. She’s strapped and suspended in a gel inside there. You don’t need to worry, she ain’t getting * out. * The Chief nods to the hardened organic pod. Kitai eyes th pod with fascination and fear.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: All you need to do is step over that red line around the pod. The gel doesn’t allow smells at certain distances, but at that distance it can smell you. Kitai eyes the pedestrian red line around the crate.

dialogues.speaker: MCQUARRIE
dialogues.text: You're not scared, are you? Small chuckles can be heard. The Rangers look to Kitai.  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 32.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I'm not scared of anything. The RANGERS reply “UHH RAHH" (THE RANGER WAR CRY) as appl for Kitai's bravado.

dialogues.speaker: MCQUARRIE
dialogues.text: (laughing) Don’t worry. Even if it imprints on you, it’s strapped and suspended. Beat. Kitai nods “Yes.”

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: ...-Ladies and gentlemen, the son of the 0.G. is going to try to ghost. Place your bets. We see Rangers exchange money in the corner. Kitai makes his way around to the rear of the organic pod the shell-like exterior of the pod there are holes so one see the gel inside. The gel appears to be EMPTY. Kitai st just outside the red line around the pod.

dialogues.speaker: KITALI
dialogues.text: I don't see anything.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: Active camouflage. Photosensitive skin cells change color and texture to match its surroundings. It un- camouflages so it can frighten you. So you release more pheromones - they’re crafty bastards. Kitai moves cautiously closer... and closer to the red li

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: Ghosting is when you don’t have a trace of fear in you. Good luck doing that. McQuarrie, tell him what it says in the manual.

dialogues.speaker: MCQUARRIE
dialogues.text: (memorized from a text) “To Ghost one must be so free from fear that you become invisible to the Ursa. Fear is territorial in your heart. It refuses to share space with any other virtues. You must force fear from your heart and replace it with any other virtue. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 33.

dialogues.speaker: MCQUARRIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It could be love or happiness or faith, but the virtue is specific to the individual and comes from the deepest part of that person.”

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: (sardonic) -You get all that, Cadet? (beat) Your dad wrote that helpful tidbit. Kitai steps defiantly over the line.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: (whispering) Try to control your breathing. Your blood is filling with adrenaline right now, whether you know it or not. Your heart’s beating faster. The pores on your skin are opening up and secreting pheromones into the air, an imperceptible amount * seeping into the molecular * structure of the gel. Kitai stands inches from the crate. His eyes wide. THERE IS SILENCE. The Rangers look at each other, surpris that nothing is happening. Does the creature not sense hi

dialogues.speaker: THE ORGANIC POD MOVES UNDER THE TENSION WIRES HOLDING IT.
dialogues.text: Kitai sees the whitish skin of the creature UN-CAMOUFLAGE

dialogues.speaker: HEARD IN THE FLASHBACK UNDER THE BED.
dialogues.text: The Chief and the others LAUGH. *

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: He sees you, kid. The Rangers instantaneously snap to their feet - their cutlasses at attention at their sides when they see CYPHE standing in the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Kitai, back in your seat now. (to Rangers) Rangers, go to Red Con 1!  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 34.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY CHIEF
dialogues.text: Secure all cargo. The Rangers snap to READY POSITION and begin locking down anything that could move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher ushers Kitai to his seat.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Under your seat there's a lifesuit. Put it on, now. Kitai reaches for the lifesuit as his face contorts with concern. “What's going on?"

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Full harness!

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Yes, sir. Kitai immediately does what he's told. Cypher turns and h toward the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher enters. The PILOT and his NAVIGATOR at the control become formal and tense.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Good evening, General. (Respectfully) Care to take the controls? Feel her out? Cypher smiles cordially.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Appreciate the offer, Captain, but it's been a while since I sat ina cockpit. The Pilot and Navigator chuckle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 35.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (steely calm) What's the last known position of the closest asteroid storm?

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: We're plotted well around those storms, sir. Nothing to worry about.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: I'd like you to check again, Captain. The Pilot dutifully checks his holographic readouts.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Category-4 asteroid formation, two thousand KM to starboard at plus- four-five declination. Bearing one- two-seven mark four.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: That's headed in our direction.

dialogues.speaker: NAVIGATOR
dialogues.text: Yes, sir, but at that distance-

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: I detected graviton vibrations in the hull. A Cat-4 storm's large enough to generate its own gravitational field, correct?

dialogues.speaker: NAVIGATOR
dialogues.text: Yes, sir, but... You detected... How?

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Graviton build-up could be a precursor to a mass expansion. That storm could be on us in minutes.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Sir, if I may, mass expansion is one in a million.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Then let’s just say I don’t like those odds. The Pilot and Navigator exchange a look.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 49 50 AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 36.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai is strapped in his seat. He is now wearing the oran lifesuit. Rangers secure cargo throughout the vessel. Kit looks nervously into the darkness outside his window. We Rangers call out - “LEFT REAR SECURE" - “CARGO HULL CHECK “RIGHT ZERO LOCKED," etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the Holographic Visual Navigation System, we see the unmistakable image of a huge swirling STORM PATTERN. The three men look on with concern.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: If we try to navigate out, the pull of our own graviton wake could set the thing off. Just hold course... and let's hope I'm wrong. BEAT. All eyes on the cockpit readouts. Everything looks stable, for now. But everyone is very tense.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Just out of interest, sir... how often are you wrong?

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: My wife would give an interesting answer to that question. Long, quiet, excruciating silence follows. Only the digit CHIRPING of the computers in the cockpit, and the empty expanse of space beyond the windshield.

dialogues.speaker: NAVIGATOR
dialogues.text: (off readout) Graviton count's decreasing. Eight hundred parts per million... Six hundred and fifty.... Finally, the tension seems to ease up. The Pilot exhales, relieved.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Well, sir, there's a first time-

dialogues.speaker: BOOOOOMMMMM
dialogues.text: Before he can finish his sentence, a terrifying sight suddenly visible in the distant star-field:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 37. Like a star going supernova, A MASSIVE WAVE OF FRAGMENTS

dialogues.speaker: IMPACT HITTING IT LIKE A FREIGHT TRAIN.
dialogues.text: The ship is VIOLENTLY BUFFETED as the rock storm engulfs them, turbulence like you've never imagined.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The main cabin gets shaken violently. Kitai grabs his sea his fingers and muscles instantly tense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher grabs an overhead handhold to stay on his feet as Pilot wrestles with the control yoke.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Turn into it! Match bearing! The cockpit instruments are COMPLETELY HAYWIRE, multiple alarms sounding as the ship lists out of control. SUV-SIZED ASTEROIDS HIT THE SHIP.

dialogues.speaker: COCKPIT COMPUTER
dialogues.text: Caution. Critical hull damage. Caution. Main power failure.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: She's a dead stick! Engines One and Two are offline! We're losing her! Cypher. Calm. Certain. Stern. This is why he's the GENERA

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Can you travel us out of here? The Pilot looks at Cypher, confused-

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Where?  53 54 AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 38.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: The anchorage on Lycia. It's the closest.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai sits TERRIFIED, nearly hyperventilating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Navigator frantically works the holographic controls his computer, but the instruments are badly on the fritz.

dialogues.speaker: NAVIGATOR
dialogues.text: Coordinates for anchorage at Lycia locked in, but no confirmation signal, sir.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Travel us now.

dialogues.speaker: NAVIGATOR
dialogues.text: Sir, without confirmation- Cypher starts pulling the jump seat down.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: That's an order. Cypher sits and pulls the double-strap harness over his shoulder. The Pilot throws open the protective cover of a CONTROL LEVER, puts his hand on it as the ship lists towa another asteroid...

dialogues.speaker: NAVIGATOR
dialogues.text: We're hot, go, go!  55 56 AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 39.

dialogues.speaker: BREAK.
dialogues.text: The Pilot throws the lever - WE SEE A DARK SPACE BEGIN TO

dialogues.speaker: GROW OUTSIDE. SOME ASTEROIDS DISAPPEAR INTO IT. THE DARK
dialogues.text: SPACE - IT GROWS LARGER OUTSIDE THE WINDOWS and the ship suddenly ROCKETS FORWARD, pinning them hard back into the seats as we're overtaken by THE MOST UTTER AND COMPLETE DARKNESS. ALL SOUND GOES AWAY...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A rich blanket of glimmering stars, silent and serene...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crew celebrates their safe arrival. The Pilot wrestle with the controls as the Navigator scans fluctuating readouts. The Navigator searches frantically on a HOLOGRA STAR MAP.

dialogues.speaker: NAVIGATOR
dialogues.text: Can't get a star fix! We are way off the grid.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: (xe: Control stick) I still got nothing here!

dialogues.speaker: COCKPIT COMPUTER
dialogues.text: Caution, life support failure.

dialogues.speaker: NAVIGATOR
dialogues.text: Cabin pressure dropping, heavy damage to outer hull. Breach possible in middle cabin.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 57 58 59 60 AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 40.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rangers scramble to secure the cabin. Kitai struggles to breathe. A Ranger hands Kitai an oxygen mask and exits to rear. Kitai is physically shaking with fear.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Find me something I can land on. The Navigator continues to work furiously... pulling up a BLUE-GREEN PLANET on the holographic imager.

dialogues.speaker: NAVIGATOR
dialogues.text: I got something! Bearing three-four- zero by nine-five, range eighty-six thousand. Looks like a C-class - nitrogen, oxygen, argon. Can't get a volumetric.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crippled ship careens toward the blue-green planet. D smoke pluming from its engines as it passes a small SPACE BUOY that activates in proximity to the passing ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher doesn't seem to notice. His eyes stare at the buoy passing by their window. Cypher unbuckles and reaches to console past the frantic Pilots and hits a button on the panel. Every speaker in the control section fills with...

dialogues.speaker: BUOY RECORDING, (RADIO)
dialogues.text: Warning. This planet has been declared unfit for human habitation. Placed under Class-1 Quarantine by the Interplanetary Authority. Under penalty of law, do not attempt to land. Repeat, do not attempt to land. 57 58 59 60  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 41. As the message repeats on a recorded loop, Cypher looks u ahead to see the familiar blue-green planet approaching. a moment, he actually looks astonished.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: It's not possible...

dialogues.speaker: NAVIGATOR
dialogues.text: The computer might have defaulted back to a known demarcation point.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (calculating) We can't... Can you travel us again?

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Negative, sir! (beat) We either land there or we break apart out here. BEAT. Then Cypher turns back toward the main cabin.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (even) Set her down. Cypher exits.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Mayday, Mayday, this is Hesper-Two- Niner-Niner heavy in distress! We took heavy damage from an asteroid storm and are going down with bingo power! Request immediate rescue, repeat, request immediate rescue! The radio gives up nothing but static in response.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 62 AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 42.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The main cabin shudders violently. Cypher steadies himsel he moves down the passenger aisle towards Kitai. The Rang are all active. They are helping to reinforce the bulkhead area whose war lights are flashing above them. They pass the equipment b and forth efficiently and move with great precision. Kita instinctively unbuckles his double harness when he sees h dad. A RANGER HANDS CYPHER A RESPIRATOR FACEMASK. Cypher slams Kitai back into his seat.

dialogues.speaker: THEY HEAR A SOUND LIKE A THOUSAND BONES BREAKING. KITAI L
dialogues.text: AROUND. SO DO THE OTHER RANGERS. Cypher helps him, lockin the belt and harness and pulling it tight. For a moment t eyes meet. Kitai stares at his dad. Cypher finally puts o his own oxygen mask.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 43.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai's eyelids slowly open. Everything is slightly slant He sees the back of the seats in front of him. Cords hang from the ceiling at angles. Kitai slowly tries to sit up. He is double-harnessed to t seat. His fingers fumble with the buckles. He gets to his feet, but he is very unsteady, dizzy and groggy. HE IS IN CLINICAL SHOCK. A FEW SHAFTS OF DAYLIGHT cut through the passenger window along the side of the fuselage and through the gaping hol fifty feet away where the ship tore in half. The severed reveals some kind of cavern outside. Kitai looks around, trying to get his bearings. His breat fogs up his oxygen mask, making it difficult to see. He p it down around his neck and immediately GASPS - FINDING I DIFFICULT to breathe. A digital readout on the mask blink Low Oxygen 15% - Caution. He brings the mask back up to his face and takes a deep g of oxygen. He then tightens his mask and moves into the aisle. He sees a body tangled between seats in impossible contortions. Kitai stares silently. His eyes huge and terrified. He moves up the aisle - another body crushed u a section of ship.  AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 44, He moves to the doors leading to the cockpit. He looks around. Debris from the plane everywhere. THEN:

dialogues.speaker: SETS OF AIRLOCK DOORS BEGIN CLOSING IN THE PASSENGER SECT
dialogues.text: THE BODY OF A DEAD RANGER is pushed by the heavy doors beginning to close. Kitai watches as the lifeless corpse shoved outside the cabin, but the arm gets stuck in the d preventing them from closing. There is a tattoo on the ma hand with the name “Anna” on it. The doors beep and buzz incessantly. He is transfixed and horrified. A computer voice repeats, “Remove Obstruction.” Kitai slowly approaches the dead man's arm. Kitai bends d and picks up a cutlass, extends it to full-out, then uses to shove the hand outside the cabin.

dialogues.speaker: BEING BLOWN HARD THROUGH VENTS.
dialogues.text: Computer Voice: “REPRESSURIZING COMPLETE.” Kitai removes his respiratory mask as the nerve-racking s finally stops. Kitai looks around nervously. Peers throug OPENING in the wall beside him that looks into the adjace corridor. THEN: *

dialogues.speaker: HE SEES HIS FATHER'S HAND ON THE GROUND.
dialogues.text: Kitai rushes through the opening and lifts the first piec debris off of him. Under it, he sees CYPHER lying on the ground. There is a broken section of the ship lying acros his legs. Kitai tries to lift it. It doesn't budge. He looks around. He finds a long metal rod that has falle from the ceiling. He wedges between the ground and the de and lifts with all his strength. The broken section of sh lifts off his father's legs. Kitai takes small steps as h lifts the debris until it is vertical and tips over away his father. IT FALLS WITH A DANGEROUS SLAM. THE SHIP ECHO WITH THE SOUND AND WEIGHT OF IT. Kitai kneels next to his father. He can see his father’s fogging up the slightest bit with his father's breathing.

dialogues.speaker: MAINTAIN HIS COMPOSURE, BUT HE CANNOT.
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 45. FADE TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher's eyes slowly open, Kitai still by his side. The following plays in REAL TIME, no time-cuts to interru Cypher and Kitai’s introduction to their dire straits. Cypher's calm eyes take in the surroundings and land on h son. Seeing Kitai breathing normally without a mask, Cyph removes his oxygen mask.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Let me see you. Can you stand? Kitai reluctantly rises.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Evaluate yourself. Kitai rolls his wrists, flexes his elbows, rotates his shoulders and neck. Leans side-to-side, front-to-back, sq up and down, testing his knees and legs. Fully-functional

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Good to go.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Turn around. Cypher watches as Kitai turns, inspecting him for damage. signs of injury. Cypher pauses. Thinks.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Confirm the Ursa is contained.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: (voice shaking) It’s gone... The whole back of the ship is gone. Cypher shouts into the main cabin.

dialogues.speaker: RANGERS
dialogues.text: Silence. 66

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revised Green 3/19/12 45A.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (coughing heavily)

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Most of them were in the back when the tail broke off.  AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 46. Cypher attempts to stand. It’s immediately clear that he cannot put weight on either leg. He yells in pain. He collapses back to the floor. Struggling to stay focuse He takes a physical assessment of himself. It’s bad.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: The cockpit is directly above us. Go. Now. Kitai reluctantly, slowly stands.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Go, Kitai. Kitai heads for the LADDER WELL down the corridor with th pace of a son certain that his father will save the day. Kitai moves into the cockpit. The Navigator and the Pilot have been crushed by a structural beam that has fallen on them in their chairs. Kitai has to lean over the dead cre and the beam to see the control board. He sees emergency lights blinking everywhere. Kitai glances to the open avionics room. Sees much of the equipment still lit up an blinking. Kitai moves to a control panel on the wall ther CYPHER’S VOICE carries up and through the stairwell--

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Go to the control board. In front of the left seat. Top row, fourth from the right. Activate Exterior Motion Sensors. Kitai tries to touch the panel. His hands are shaking violently. He clamps his hands together to get them to st shaking. He tries again. He finally finds the screen for “Exterior Motion Sensors." He hits a button with tremblin fingers. “Motion Sensor Activated" appears on the screen.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: Check.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Over your right shoulder. Kitai turns, following his father’s directions--

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: To the right of the ladder well you just came through, there is a utility compartment. Go through it. There is an emergency beacon. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 67 AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 46A.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Rounded silver top like a saucer, tapers at the bottom. Nine by three. We need it to send a distress signal. Bring it to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai approaches the communication rack. The rack has bee damaged. Kitai finds the emergency beacon, like a small interstellar craft the size of a snowshoe. The bottom of beacon is crushed. Kitai carries it to Cypher. Cypher lifts the beacon and inspects the damage to the bottom. He switches it on. The activity light stays off.  AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 47. Cypher detaches and examines the mangled lower section of beacon. THE BEACON IS USELESS. Cypher's face goes white with despair. This is not good. Kitai watches curiously as Cypher's mind races. Another decision washes over Cypher's face.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Kitai, my left shoulder is dislocated. Come here. Cypher lays down on his back. Places Kitai’s left foot on shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (to Kitai) Take my wrist with both hands.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (shaken) Wait! DAD. Wait!

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (ignoring him) You need to pull as hard as you can. Kitai sits. He reluctantly takes Cypher's wrist. Cypher n to Kitai “One... Two...!!!” Kitai pulls desperately, his muscles straining. Cypher screams in agony. Kitai watches, frightened.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: We didn't get it. We didn't get it. ONE MORE! Pull harder, Cadet. I’ve been through worse. KITAI BRACES HIMSELF, DETERMINED.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: One... Two... Three!

dialogues.speaker: AAAAHHHH
dialogues.text: 68 AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 48. Kitai looks on in HORROR. Cypher tests his shoulder -- hi range of motion intact, to a point.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (gasping for air) You got it. You got it. (looking around) We need to get me into the cockpit. (beat) There's a cargo loader at the rear. While Kitai moves for the loader, we watch as Cypher mana to prop up on his good elbow and assess things: how the s is twisted like a double helix; how BLOOD soaks through t pants on his LEFT LEG and his RIGHT ANKLE can’t be turned without pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STILL IN REAL-TIME. A flat hydraulic machine with wheels lowered next to Cypher. Kitai gets distracted as he notic THE WINDOWS OUTSIDE HAVE FROZEN OVER WITH ICE. Kitai returns to the loader. It sits on a CARGO ELEVATOR the ship’s front bow. There is a small ramp that is flipp over. It touches the ground. Kitai hits a button and the starts to move like a conveyor belt. Kitai looks at his father who braces his arms at his sides. Kitai comes arou Kitai lifts his father’s leg. Places it on the belt. Kita pauses, noticing that even the slightest touch makes Cyph WINCE. Cypher starts to get dragged. Kitai hurries and li the second leg. Cypher jockeys his upper body until he is the conveyor belt completely. He is slowly deposited on t top of the flattened loader. THERE IS BLOOD FROM HIS LEGS THE RAMP OF THE LOADER. Kitai’s eyes shift from the BLOOD on his hands -- his father’s blood -- to Cypher, lying exhausted on the loade For the first time, Kitai realizes the statue that is Cyp Raige can be broken. Kitai presses a button and THE ELEVATOR BEGINS TO RISE. H cranes his neck to watch his father.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (calling down) Inventory up. Full assets. Now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 69 70 AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 48A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher sits in front of the PILOTS’ CONTROL CENTER, occup the space where the Navigator once sat. The cargo loader as an adjustable gurney. Cypher's hand moves to the contr on the chair. He slowly raises his upper body and sits himself upright, propping his left leg on the console bes him. Cypher places his palm on a terminal to activate the cockpit computers. The initial burst of POWER gives Cyphe some hope. A hologram flashes --

dialogues.speaker: IDENTITY VERIFIED
dialogues.text: And THE COMPUTERS FULLY BOOT UP. The console in front of Pilot’s seat is completely destroyed, but the holographic display in front of Cypher spits out initial READINGS, wh he continues to situate himself: * MAIN CABIN BREACH.... SELF-SEALING IN PROGRESS.... * TRANSPORT SHIP.... CONDITION CRITICAL.... Cypher glances at the cockpit recorder on the other side the cockpit. As he speaks, VOICE WAVES undulate on one of monitors, indicating that the recorder is doing its job--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 49,

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: General Cypher Raige. First quarter Earth day. Crash landed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai pulls the dead Navigator to a hatch that is now ope the floor. Cold clouds rise from the hatch. A sign on the floor reads NITRO STORAGE CONTAINER. Kitai pulls the Navigator until he falls into the container and quickly closes the hatch. Touching the dead bodies has severely shaken him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai approaches his father's side, carrying supplies. Hi confidence slowly waning. He can see blood dripping from edge of Cypher's pant leg onto the floor. Cypher looks to Kitai, assessing his mental condition. Supplies are stacked nearby, among them six cutlasses. Ki places a med-kit and CYPHER’S KIT BAG beside the stack.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: I need you to focus right now. (beat) Assets? Kitai does not respond. He is lost in his father's injuri

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (calmly ) Cadet? I need an accounting of our assets. Kitai struggles to focus. He looks to the supplies in fro of him. Cypher intently probes Kitai's body language. Eve facial twitch, every stutter, everything.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Four bodies, I put them in the nitro compartment. Radio non- operational. Four Ranger packs. Cabin pressure stable. Five- (correcting himself) No-- six functional cutlasses. One emergency med-kit. And I got your bag from the troop bay.

dialogues.speaker: 70A
dialogues.text: a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 49A. Cypher manipulates the cockpit controls. A HOLOGRAPHIC IMAGE OF A LANDSCAPE arises over the consol

dialogues.speaker: HOLOGRAPHIC LANDSCAPE.
dialogues.text: Cypher stares at the BLINKING MARKER. His expression becomes grim. He is deciding something... eyes betray uncharacteristic emotion and struggle. He continues to stare at the BLINKING MARKER. Cypher takes a deep breath. His eyes fill with decisiveness.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Hand me the med-kit. Ranger pack.  AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 50. Kitai moves across the room and retrieves the two items. Cypher places the med-kit and Ranger pack in his lap. Tak Kitai’s wrist and turns it over -- activating the NAVI-BA on Kitai’s lifesuit. SCORES OF INFORMATION AND DATA LAYER AROUND KITAI’S WRIST like a holographic bracelet. Kitai’s never seen anything like this before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE MONITOR TO CYPHER’S RIGHT FILLS WITH NUMBERS AND GRAP THAT MATCH THOSE ON KITAI’S NAVI-BAND. We realize Cypher syncing Kitai with the cockpit computers. *

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Cadet. Center yourself. Kitai does so. He calms. The BALL SHRINKS and MOVES INSID THE DIAMOND. Kitai pulls down his shirt and closes his lifesuit. Cypher sits back and stares heavily into Kitai' eyes. The weight of their predicament hangs between them. Cypher looks to his son. Cypher steadies his own heart an speaks. Kitai hangs riveted on every word.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: The emergency beacon you brought me will fire a distress signal deep into space. Kitai nods with comprehension.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: But it’s damaged. Cypher rapidly runs a scan for SPARE BEACON. He does not the answer he finds. He steels himself.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: There is another one, in the tail * section of our ship. Kitai studies his father, not sure what he is saying. Cyp brings up THE HOLOGRAPHIC LANDSCAPE. It is a stunning vis Grainy computerized imagery. We can make out mountain ran rivers, valleys, forests, deserts, small storm patterns, animals, birds, etc. THERE IS A BLINKING MARKER.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (pointing to the screen) This is us here. I can’t get an * accurate reading, but the tail is somewhere in this area, * approximately one hundred kilometers from here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 51. He points to DARK AREAS that move like black clouds and c information to FALL OUT in that region. We see the tail as a red blinking dot.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: We need that beacon. Slowly the realization of what Cypher is saying begins to wash over Kitai's face. His eyes well with tears. Suddenl Cypher understands the magnitude of his words. He struggl to be the General, but in this moment he is only a father

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Kitai, my legs are broken. One very badly. You are going to retrieve that beacon or we are going to die. Do you understand? Kitai nods his head, “Yes." Cypher's eyes begin to well a beats back his raging emotion. Kitai does not falter. He not waiver. He simply wipes his eyes and like a true Rang awaits his orders, but like Kitai, he can’t help sneaking glance at the blinking RED DOT as a DARK AREA blots it ou Kitai pulls his attention from the map. Cypher has opened small black medical case marked: UNIVERSAL AIR FILTRATION - EMERGENCY USE ONLY. Inside, six vials are lined up.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: You have air filtration inhalers. Cypher removes one of the vials.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: You need to take one now. The fluid will coat your lungs, increase your oxygen extraction, and allow you to breathe comfortably in the atmosphere. Cypher demonstrates how to use the inhaler. Kitai places vial to his lips, presses the release, and inhales deeply

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: You have six vials. At your weight, that should be twenty to twenty- four hours each. That's more than enough. Cypher helps Kitai with his Navi-band. A digital map layo appears as a hologram above Kitai's wrist.  AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 52.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Your lifesuit and backpack are equipped with digital and virtual imaging. So I will be able to see everything you see and what you don't see. Cypher places the Ranger backpack on Kitai’s back and tur him around so that his backpack camera is facing Cypher. Cypher taps a control on the console and a MONITOR in fro of Kitai comes alive -- Kitai can see CYPHER’S FACE on it father looking deep into the heart of his child.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (on the monitor) I will guide you. Cypher taps the same control to shut down the monitor. Tu Kitai to face him.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: It will be like I'm right there with you. (beat) Take my cutlass. Cypher holds out his cutlass. Kitai looks at it. His dad passing his weapon brings the reality of the moment home.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Go on. Take it. C-40. The full twenty-two configurations. Kitai holds the weighty cutlass. It looks big in his hand Father and son stare, knowing full well this may be the l time they ever see one another.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: This is not training. The threats you will be facing are REAL. Every single decision you make will be life or death. This is a Class-1 quarantined planet. Everything on this planet has evolved to kill humans. (beat) Do you know where we are?

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: No, sir.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: This is Earth, Kitai.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 52A. Cypher allows this reality to sink in on his son.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: The Ursa? The very word sends chills down Kitai's spine.  AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 53.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: There are three possibilities. The first and most likely is that it died in the crash. This thought comforts Kitai.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: The second and less likely is that it is injured very badly and still contained. Cypher attempts to calm Kitai with the certainty in his voice.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: And the third and least likely is that it is out. The two pause thoughtfully.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: We will proceed, however, in anticipation of the worst-case scenario. Every movement will be under protocol: Escape and Evade. If he's out there, I will see him long before he gets anywhere near you. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Don’t get ahead of yourself. Do everything that I say and we will survive. Beat.  71 AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 54. Kitai wraps Cypher in a hug. He can barely get his arm ar his father’s shoulders, but it doesn’t matter. Father and son hug for what seems like an eternity. He cannot see hi father’s face, but we can see Cypher is frightened for hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: son. A time for the General, but the Father is winning. *

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Time’s wasting. And we've got a lot to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai forces himself out of his father’s arms. Does his b to stand straight and stay tough as he snaps his cutlass his backpack. * A last look, before Kitai manages a weak military turn an exits. ON CYPHER -- watching his child walk into the unkn

dialogues.speaker: THEY SLIDE OMINOUSLY OPEN, EXPOSING KITAI TO THE UNKNOWN.
dialogues.text: Kitai stands in the hallway, between two airlock doors. T ice on the windows is melting as the FIRST LIGHT STARTS

dialogues.speaker: PENETRATING THE DARKNESS OUTSIDE.
dialogues.text: Kitai turns over his wrist, activating his Navi-band and many holographic layers. *

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Can you hear me, Dad? Over.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Copy. Kitai stares into the shadows. He looks to his cutlass gleaming in its retracted state. He taps a combination on handle. IT INSTANTLY FORMS A CURVED BLADE THAT IF NOT FOR PROTECTIVE LIFESUIT WOULD HAVE SLICED HIS ARM. He stares the near miss. Retracts it. He taps another pattern. THE FIBERS EXTEND TO SIX FEET LONG - razor-sharp at the ends. Reveal a rock cavern. KITAI HEARS THE SOUND OF SMALL STON FALLING. He exits the torn end of the ship. He breathes heavily as the large doors close behind him, cutlass read He jumps down - sees A FEW BODIES OF RANGERS HANGING DEAD

dialogues.speaker: FRIGHTENED. HE BACKS AWAY.
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Green 3/19/12 54A.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Kitai, take a knee. Kitai kneels down on one knee as he’s told.  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 55.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: I want you to take your time. Acclimate yourself to the environment. Tell me any and everything. No matter how inconsequential it may seem. Everything you see, hear, smell, how you feel. Over. KITAI CAN SEE DAYLIGHT ABOVE HIM.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (breathing heavily) My body feels heavier.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Very good. The gravitational pull on this planet is slightly different than at home. Kitai calms. He looks up.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: It's about ten meters to the top.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Okay. Get going.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Roger. Kitai stands and moves cautiously to the wall of the ravi the ship is in. He begins climbing. He carefully places e hand and foot. This is a standard rock climbing wall.
