He' done this a thousand times. He nears the top. He secures left hand then looks back to his right and sees: A HUGE MULTI-COLORED TARANTULA SITS ON HIS RIGHT HAND. KITAI FREAKS.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Abhhhh! He slings the creature from his hand - losing his balance slipping three feet until he catches himself with his lef hand.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: KITAI! What happened? Kitai hangs by a thread. He stabilizes himself and regain his grip.  72 73 AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 56.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: You didn’t see that? I thought-

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: What’s your SitRep? Your vitals spiked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher watches the monitor as Kitai's vitals spike into t RED.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: I say again. What is your Situation Report? What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai’s face changes. He settles back into control.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (embarrassed) No change. I slipped. I’m good to go. (lying) There's condensation on the stones. I'm fine. Kitai continues and successfully completes his ascent. He wearily reaches the top of the crater and pulls himself o an elevated plateau.

dialogues.speaker: REVEAL
dialogues.text: The beautiful purple, orange, and fuchsia colors of the earthly sunrise. Plants and animals waking up to melodic morning calls of eagles majestically soaring overhead. Miles and miles of visibility. Hundreds, maybe thousands, evolved buffalo roam a quarter mile away. The sounds of l ring symphonically. IT IS BREATHTAKING. Kitai is dumbstru The night frost gives way to vibrant colors and scents.  74 75 76 AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 57.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: There is an escarpment where two Earth continents collided. Looks like it could be a waterfall. It's at about forty-five kilometers. We'll call that our midway checkpoint. There’s no way you can return after that point. We'll assess rations and reevaluate when you get there. But let’s break it into sections.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher looks at the monitor. We see an icon for Kitai and the north a huge grouping of trees. Cypher draws a line f Kitai to the trees.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: First leg is twenty kilometers to the mouth of the north forest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai looks to his Navi-band on his wrist. The holographi imagery matches what Cypher saw in the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Let’s take it easy. Set chronometer for one hundred eighty minutes. Over.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: One hundred eighty minutes? That’s not right. I can do 10K in fifty minutes. You'll see. Kitai looks to his Navi-band and begins a light jog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher takes this as a disobeyed command. He sits back in seat, contemplatively. 74 75 76

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 58.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: I might even do it in under forty minutes. Over. Cypher does not respond.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai slows down.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Dad, do you copy? Over. Kitai comes to a stop.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (concerned) Dad, do you read me?! Over. Still nothing.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: (panicked)

dialogues.speaker: DAD, DO YOU COPY
dialogues.text: Kitai turns and runs back toward the ship. He is in compl terror.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: Dad, I'm coming back.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: No need. You just go ahead. Kitai comes to stop.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Seems to me that you're in charge of this mission. And in my limited military experience, when two people are in command, everybody dies. So I will defer to your leadership, Cadet.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Dad, I was just saying...  AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: What is my name? Kitai confused - hesitates.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I don't know what you mean...

dialogues.speaker: WHAT IS MY NAME
dialogues.text: Kitai is shaken.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: General Cypher Raige.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: And who am I?

dialogues.speaker: KITALI
dialogues.text: Prime Commander of the Rangers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher stares at the holograms.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Kitai's head is spinning. His father has never been this angry with him before. Kitai snaps to attention.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 78 79  AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 60.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher sits calmly. (There was a bit of military performa in Cypher's words) He's seen many men in combat. He knows exactly what they need and exactly when they need it.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Now at H plus one eighty I need you at that forest. Set your chronometer.

dialogues.speaker: SIR, YES, SIR
dialogues.text: Cypher sits back, allowing himself a small smile. Cypher reaches out and turns on the COCKPIT RECORDER.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: General Cypher Raige. Earth time 6:24. Beginning probe search to confirm Ursa is not released.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai sets his chronometer and begins to walk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the front section of the ship wedged into the cave

dialogues.speaker: A PROJECTILE RISES OUT OF THE CAVERN AND INTO THE SKY. RI
dialogues.text: HIGHER AND HIGHER INTO THE ATMOSPHERIC CANOPY. At the APE ITS ARC, it EXPLODES -- From the EXPLOSION, DOZENS OF PROBES APPEAR, slowly VECTO back toward EARTH, GREAT DISTANCES APART.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 61.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher’s monitors fill with PROBE IMAGES: THE CURVE OF TH

dialogues.speaker: FLOATING OVER PACKS OF ANIMALS, THOUSANDS OF THEM.
dialogues.text: Cypher flips through the images of the different cameras. see the descriptions, “PROBE 3, PROBE 11, PROBE 24” writt under each of the corresponding images... He manipulates cameras. They can hover, swim, and burrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE SEE THE POINT OF VIEW OF KITAI moving along a horizon pastures that seem to go on forever. WE SEE KITAI’S VIEW along a ridge that looks down into a valley with a profusion of wildflowers and greens. Cypher studies numbers floating over the control board.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: I estimate H plus four days to reach the tail. Use your Navi-band. Stay on azimuth. The temperatures on this planet fluctuate dramatically daily and most of the planet freezes over at night.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: There are hot spots, geothermal nodes between here and the tail that will keep you warm during the freeze-over. You must reach one of these nodes each evening before nightfall. Over.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (VOICE THROUGH COMPUTER)
dialogues.text: Copy. WE SEE KITAI’S POINT OF VIEW LOOK UP TO HIS SIDES.

dialogues.speaker: SPIRITS.
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 62.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Standard operating procedure till I give you further instructions.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (VOICE THROUGH COMPUTER)
dialogues.text: Copy. Cypher looks down at his legs. THE FLOOR IS COVERED IN HI BLOOD. HE CAN SEE HIS PANT LEG DRIPPING FRESH BLOOD. Cypher reaches for the med-kit. Hits controls on the cons The “Medical Analysis” holographic screen comes up. Cypher pulls a flat box out of the med-kit. He turns it o runs it over his legs. LIGHT FALLS OVER HIS LEG AS IT SCA The holographic screen over the console erupts with information. “,..CODE 5 TRAUMA TO LEFT LEG

dialogues.speaker: .-.-SITUATION CRITICAL
dialogues.text: ... ARTERIAL SHUNT RECOMMENDED” Cypher takes in the news somberly. He touches the words, ARTERIAL SHUNT, over the console.

dialogues.speaker: THE HOLOGRAPHIC SCREEN SHOWS A 3-D OUTLINE OF A HUMAN BOD
dialogues.text: bit too similar to a chalk outline on concrete. The holographic screen ZOOMS IN to the LEFT THIGH -- ZOOMS IN

dialogues.speaker: SHOW ARTERIES AND VEINS. ONE HAS BEEN SEVERED AND SEPARAT
dialogues.text: The words, ARTERIAL SHUNT - EXPLANATION OF PROCEDURE, app on the screen, followed by a coldly mechanical HOLOGRAPHI

dialogues.speaker: ANIMATION
dialogues.text: A SCALPEL appears on the screen. A DOTTED LINE extends fr the blade to a spot LOW on the thigh; The scalpel PLUNGES INTO THE ANIMATED THIGH -- We don’t see the rest. Only Cypher’s single blink and sli shift, accepting the painful reality to come. Cypher looks in the med-kit. Sees a cylinder marked “Narcotic.” Looks at the side-effects on the cylinder’s s He reads the words, “Impaired vision, dizziness, drowsine Cypher looks at the screen of Kitai’s moving POV. He puts narcotic cylinder back in the med-kit untouched. A wave of pain engulfs Cypher. a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 86 AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 63.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (VOICE THROUGH COMPUTER)
dialogues.text: Hey Dad, you there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher is in military gear. He is in a battlefield trench There are other soldiers with him. There is a moment of peace. Senshi appears on his navi-band. He moves it into shadows to see her better. In the background we see she i the old Raige apartment. A young Kitai is playing in the background.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI, (VOICE THROUGH COMPUTER)
dialogues.text: Dad, you there?  AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 63A. In the background we see she is in the old Raige apartmen young Kitai is playing in the background.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI, (VOICE THROUGH COMPUTER)
dialogues.text: Dad, you there?  AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 Cypher smiles.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: I’m here. She holds up the old copy of Moby Dick.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI, (VOICE THROUGH COMPUTER)
dialogues.text: A boy I know had this. It’s a real book, from a museum. It’s Moby Dick. Cypher not fully paying attention.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Mm hmm...

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: He said I could even hold on to it. That gets his attention --

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Hold on to what --?

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: The book, Dad. She laughs at her dad’s expression. And he laughs, too. S has that effect on him. Cypher stares at his daughter, so full of life and possibility, the future personified.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: Did they really kill these whales?

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: We, Senshi. For their oil. And they almost disappeared. Just before The Age of Carbon Fuels...

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (VOICE THROUGH COMPUTER)
dialogues.text: Dad, you there? Over. Cypher recovers from the pain, clears his throat, collect himself before he speaks.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Copy. 64. 87  AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 64A. Cypher turns his eyes to holographic displays.  88 89 AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 65.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Cadet, the Earth's rotational cycle is shorter than back home. You have six hours to reach the first geothermal site. Over.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (VOICE THROUGH COMPUTER)
dialogues.text: Roger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai moves along a jagged fissure in the ground. Rocks j up from the darkness below as if someone cracked the surf of the Earth like an egg. The sun is INTENSELY STRONG.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Let's stay in the shade as much as possible. Direct sunlight is intensely carcinogenic. You must limit exposure. Over.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: Roger that.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMPUTER)
dialogues.text: The rain used to be acidic, but it doesn’t seem to be a problem now. Green slopes away on either side of the fissure in the ea Kitai is making good progress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher checks IMAGES FROM THE PROBE CAMERAS. #11 is KNOCK AS A LARGE ANIMAL BRUSHES PAST -- A HUGE EVOLVED GIRAFFE. The animal now looks into the camera. The giraffe rears u two legs. The computer sends Cypher information -- GIRAFF CAMELOPARDALIS.. GIRAFFE. Cypher looks at the LIVE IMAGE OF THE GIRAFFE with awe. I like seeing a live dinosaur. Then the giraffe swats at the camera. The camera evades. Cypher hits the cockpit recorder. 88 89  90 91 AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 66.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Probe cameras unable to detect signs of Ursa in the wild.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai arrives at the mouth of the forest. A gorgeous view endless thick valleys of forest.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (checking his Navi-band) Twenty kilometers, one hundred eighty-four minutes. Request breather, Da... (catching himself) SIR.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Negative. (beat) You've got three hours to reach the hot spot. That's plenty of time. Hydrate now and keep moving. Kitai flips up a hydration tube from his backpack and dri as he moves deeper into the forest. Kitai swallows his irritation and moves into the forest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai is in a profound forest. The trees are gigantic - twenty feet in diameter - three hundred feet high. Kitai moves carefully through the many shadows in the forest. H peers cautiously into the foliage all around him. Kitai suddenly looks down and notices his lifesuit has be

dialogues.speaker: JET BLACK. ITS SURFACE HAS TURNED HARDER AND HAS BUMPS LI
dialogues.text: AN ARMOR. Kitai instantly stops walking and becomes steel

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: My suit’s become black. I like it but I think it’s something bad. Over.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Your suit’s made of smart fabric. It has motion sensors. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 66A.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: I'm tracking a lifeform moving near you from the west.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revised Yellow 2/24/12 67.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: The Ursa? Over.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Negative. It's smaller. Bio signs read only a meter-and-a-half long. Kitai stands motionless. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (are you kidding me?) I'm a meter-and-a-half long! Over.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: It's closing rapidly from the west. DO NOT MOVE! It is what it is. Relax. Go ready. Try to give me visual. Creatures on this planet have evolved from the ones we have on record because of radiation bursts.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: It's at fifty meters, forty, thirty... Kitai is breathing erratically.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: It's slowing down. Twenty (long pause) Ten... Kitai stands at the ready. HE CAN HEAR PLANTS BEING SNAPP

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: (whispering) It's right there, Kitai. Kitai in a panicked whisper.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I don't see it! I don't see anything.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Relax, Cadet. Recognize your power. This will be your creation. Slowly from the forest - a small evolved baboon creature. face is hauntingly human, but it walks on all fours.  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 67A. At least it would if it hadn't lost one of its appendages what looks like might have been a fight.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 92 93 94 95 AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 68.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher gets a visual from Kitai's lifesuit camera and on screen comes a full description of the creature.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: It's fine, Kitai. Be still. Let it pass. Do not startle it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai PICKS UP A ROCK and threatens. Sound is dopplering, vision tunneling.

dialogues.speaker: BACK UP
dialogues.text: The creature reacts with loud screech.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Don’t do anything!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher is pissed!

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Kitai, NO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai continues to threaten with the rock.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Kitai, STOP! Over. Kitai THROWS THE ROCK, glancing off the baboon. The baboo just turns and leaves. Kitai almost hyperventilating.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 92 93 94 95  96 AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 68A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher looks at the holographic readout. Kitai's vitals a spiking. 96  97 98 AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 69.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: You are creating this situation! Be still. Over. Suddenly on the monitor FIFTEEN DOTS begin moving rapidly towards Kitai.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (to himself) Damn it! (beat) Cadet, get control of yourself! Listen to my instructions!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai feeling like his way was working, the Way of the Ro when SIX of the CREATURES blast through the foliage, screeching a bloodcurdling war cry. They surround Kitai. Kitai taps a pattern into the handle of the cutlass. The fibers retract into the handle and disappear. This is not what Kitai wanted. He looks up panicked He taps another pattern. The handle separates into two parts. The fibers flatten out at the ends, making two batons. Kitai swings new weapons in every direction. The creatures begin charg and jumping back, mimicking Kitai's moves. They study Kit and all begin to pick up sticks and clubs, mimicking the ends of the cutlass.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: To your rear, Cadet! OUT TO YOUR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher gets the chilling firsthand camera view. He watche helplessly as Kitai attempts to evade the raging creature WE SEE FROM THE CAMERA ON KITAI’S BACK - THE CREATURES GETTING CLOSER.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 97 98  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai is really fast. He leaps off of rocks and sprints through the dense forest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher sits in steely calm.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Cross the river, Cadet! I repeat, cross the river!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher watches the underwater view in all its glorious te as Kitai goes up and down. Bobbing underwater and above. Kitai looks back, giving Cypher the clear view that the creatures are not following.  AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 71.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Cadet, they are no longer in pursuit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai is not registering his father's words. He exits the river on the other side and continues to flee frantically His lifesuit has returned to orange.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: (calmly) I say again, they are not following you. Over. Kitai sprints wildly.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Cadet, you are not being followed! Take a knee. Over! Kitai slows when he reaches a clearing and again takes ou the cutlass He makes a three-hundred-sixty degree turn, prepared to fight anything in his vicinity.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Put my damn cutlass away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher watches the maddening 360-degree pivot.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Take a knee, Cadet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai kneels on one knee. His eyes are large and frantic. He tries to settle his breathing. Seems to calm himself.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 72. 106 107

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher watches his son.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: If you want to die today that’s fine, but you are not going to kill me today. You are not out here by yourself. Everything you do affects me. I see right now that you do not have the intelligence to think for yourself, so I will be your brain. You DO NOT think. Cypher rubs his eyes. THEN: BEEP. BEEP. BEEP... Cypher looks to Kitai's vital sign readout.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (concerned) Kitai, I need you to do a physical assessment. I'm showing rapid blood contamination. Are you cut?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai does not respond. He is shell-shocked. He doesn’t s like a cadet right now. He seems like a child. His lifesu has turned yellow.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: (sternly)

dialogues.speaker: EVALUATION
dialogues.text: Slowly, Kitai regains himself and begins to check his bod He tries to stand, but is suddenly unsteady and off-balan

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Kitai?

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I'm dizzy.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Check yourself. + eH HH HK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 72A. Kitai looks at his hands. On his right wrist he spots an EVOLVED LEECH-LIKE PARASITE. He pulls it off. It tears hi skin. A NASTY RASH quickly blossoms across his skin on his wris

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: (ultra calm) Open your med-kit, Kitai. Kitai reaches for his belt. His face anxious now.  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 73.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (groggy) I can't stand up. Kitai opens the med-kit. Cypher takes his vocal tones int complete certainty and calm. He knows that he cannot betr even a hint of tension.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: (measured and comforting) You have to administer the antitoxin in sequence. Inject yourself with the clear liquid first. Do it now! Kitai takes the first hypodermic from the med-kit, pops o the protective cap. His hands are trembling.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Dad. I can't see.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: The poison is affecting your nervous system. Relax. Stay even. Kitai fumbles twice with the needle. He stops, looks up, looks around, his eyes dilated and swelling closed. His p deepening. The veins of his right hand are turning black.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Dad, please come help me. I can't see! Please come help me!

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Stay even! Inject yourself directly into the heart with the first stage now! Kitai takes a deep breath, grimacing as he removes the to his lifesuit and sticks himself in the chest with the hypodermic, presses the plunger. WE HEAR A DISCHARGE SOUN

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Now the second stage. Hurry. Kitai snatches his backpack off and fumbles around blindl the med-kit.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Your left, to your left! Kitai finds the second hypodermic. HIS EYES NOW COMPLETEL SWOLLEN CLOSED. His hands shaking badly, he just about manages to remove the protective cap.  AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 74. He sticks himself with the second hypodermic, but his thu just hovers over the plunger, unable to move.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I can't feel my hands! I can't... Kitai's eyes roll back, flickering. On the verge of losin consciousness. He falls to his knees.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Press it into the ground! Kitai, roll over on it and press it into the ground! With a final effort, Kitai throws himself forward, the plunger depressing against the ground as he slumps over. Kitai's limp body lies motionless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher watches as Kitai's blood contamination levels begi slowly decrease. The red beeping lights turn to yellow, signaling a slow return of Kitai's vital signs to normal.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Great work, Cadet. Now you’re going to have to lie there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai's body. Hauntingly still. Alone.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: The parasite that stung you has a paralyzing agent in its venom. You're just going to have to lie there for a little bit while the antitoxin does its job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher is precise, but Kitai's backpack camera brutally captures Kitai's swollen face. A single tear rolls from a lifeless eye.  AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 75. 111 112 This is excruciating. Cypher, unable to aid his son, struggles for control in an uncontrollable situation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From a distance we see how small Kitai is in this huge cr forest. The sun perilously slipping beyond its apex.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher glances at the timer. His lifeless son. We pan around Cypher to a full-frame view of Kitai - seemingly close, yet so far. He stares at his son.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 76. 113 114

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun is now treacherously low in the sky, threatening drop. A chilly breeze begins to blow through the retreati forest. Plants begin to close in anticipation of the brut night freeze. Kitai still lies motionless. The swelling is gone from hi face but his eyes are still closed. His lifesuit is orang

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Kitai. No response. A gentle dusting of frost begins to form on and around Kitai's weakened frame. Cypher grows increasingly distres The wind howls with ferocious intention.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Kitai, it's time to get up. Kitai's eyes give no sign of life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher looks at his son’s beautiful face, praying for any muscle twitch or flicker of life.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Kitai, I want you to blink your eyes. Still nothing. There is a long beat. We vaguely hear Kita breathing. A tiny hint of ice shows on his left eyebrow.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (deeply concerned) Son, I need you to please blink your eyes. Slowly... and ever so slightly... Kitai opens his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (FACE ON THE SCREEN)
dialogues.text: (xaspy voice) Hey, Dad.  AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 77. Kitai still looks directly into his backpack camera speak to Cypher. We see a full-frame image of Kitai. Cypher sta at the monitors and the bio-readings and exhales profound

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (FACE ON THE SCREEN)
dialogues.text: (weakly) That sucked. Kitai awkwardly begins to stand and gather his gear.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: The temperature is dropping five degrees every ten minutes. You've got twelve kilometers to the hot spot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai's vitals are stable. He has gathered his gear and i ready to go. Cypher returns to General mode.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Let's see that “Ten kilometers in fifty minutes" that you spoke about earlier, Cadet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai sets his Navi-band and turns to the north.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (still weak) Sir, yes, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai sprints ruggedly over the vicious terrain. Signs of DEEP FREEZE are prominent and extreme. Animals scramble underground. IT BEGINS TO LIGHTLY SNOW.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: sitRep?  AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 78. 118

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Ten Mikes out. Good. All good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The words “Arterial Shunt” stare back at Cypher from the screen. He pulls a long, narrow tubing from the med-kit a thin surgical knife. He opens an arm on the flat box and locks it to his chair The box is now positioned over his left thigh. He rips th side of his uniform, exposing the side of the leg. We see nasty gash on the side of his leg. THE HOLOGRAPHIC SCREEN SHOWS CYPHER’S ARTERIES AND VEINS GRAPHIC. ONE HAS BEEN SEVERED AND SEPARATED. The reality far worse than any animation could ever be. Cypher casts a quick glance to KITAI’S VIEW, as he sprint through the snowy landscape. A reminder of what’s at stak Without fanfare, Cypher plunges the thin knife into the s of his leg. His face and demeanor tighten under the strain.

dialogues.speaker: FLESH REACHING THE END OF THE SEVERED ARTERY.
dialogues.text: After reaching it, he pulls the knife out. Cypher takes a few preparing breaths, focusing his eyes o KITAI’S VIEW of the passing nature, before doing it again higher on the thigh. The knife again cuts through his thi muscle. WE SEE IT REACH THE OTHER SEVERED END. Cypher recovers the knife. Cypher is shaking uncontrollab for a moment. He stares at a point in the distance and regains his composure. He inserts the tubing in one of the incisions in his leg.

dialogues.speaker: AROUND IT.
dialogues.text: A tear from effort and pain falls down Cypher’s cheek. He looks around wildly, like a wolf caught in a trap. He scr and turns toward LENS, then looks again. As the camera fi THE GENERAL calmly watching him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 78A.

dialogues.speaker: THE GENERAL
dialogues.text: I got this. Cypher’s face becomes emotionless. He removes all reactio from his face. He grabs the thin tubing from the med-kit. Cypher is shaking again as he grabs the other end of the and inserts it into the second incision. This end slips i the ragged end of the severed artery. The fit is less perfect. Cypher wiggles it, almost passing out from pain. READOUT: ARTERIAL SHUNT 87% EFFECTIVE. Cypher looks down and sees what we see. Blood starts flow through the sagging tube hanging out of his leg. The arte begins flowing again. Good enough for now. The words, “Arterial Shunt” disappear from the screen. Cypher’s head hits the back of the loader. Blood continues to flow through the tube. Cypher stares a the screen of his son’s POV. He strains to stay conscious We hear Kitai’s voice over the computer as he runs.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (VOICE THROUGH COMPUTER)
dialogues.text: Five Mikes out. (feeling his oats) Who wasn’t advanced to Ranger? Who was it? Watch him go. Watch him go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 79. 119 Cypher stares, on the verge of unconsciousness. His eyes close. His eyes open. His eyes close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A drop captain yells.

dialogues.speaker: DROP CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Five Mikes out! He yells this to the Rangers waiting in the ship. Cypher holds a piece of 12x15 smart fabric in his hands. This is like a future iPad that can be rolled or folded. On the fabric is the face of Senshi. She sits at a table a birthday cake in front of her. There are nineteen candl Faia and a nine-year-old Kitai sit together. Senshi waves the Moby Dick book at the camera.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI, (VOICE FROM SCREEN)
dialogues.text: There’s this character, the savage. He has a shrunken head. So cool! He’s my favorite character.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (distracted) He’s a good character. Something interesting happens to him later. She holds up the cake toward her father.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: Dad, you help me.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: No Senshi, you go ahead. You blow.  AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 80.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI, (VOICE FROM SCREEN)
dialogues.text: Come on, Dad. Blow. Cypher glances at the Rangers watching him.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Now, you know there’s no way I can actually do that from here.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: No, I think you can.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Faia, why don’t you step in here and help the girl? Faia comes into frame --

dialogues.speaker: FAIA
dialogues.text: You can do it.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: I know you can. Cypher shoots a glance over his shoulder. A RANGER stands there, stone-faced. Cypher looks at the cake. Senshi’s expectant face. He lea forward quickly and blows -- THE CANDLES BLOW OUT as by magic. Then Kitai’s face leans into the frame, laughing. He blew the candles. Cypher’s family laughing.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Happy nineteenth birthday, Senshi.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: I have to go. Cypher taps the smart fabric in his hands. It turns off. tucks it away. All the Rangers in the ship stand. They st on their gear. They look to their leader. The back of the ship begins to open. Cypher stares at it it opens.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Rangers! In formation! Move!

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An elevated volcanic area. STEAM RISES FROM THE GROUND. L overripe fallen trees, rich decay everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Hot Spot One arrival. (checks) H plus forty-eight minutes! Outside the geothermal zone, THE FOREST IN ALL DIRECTIONS

dialogues.speaker: IN A RAPID FREEZE. ENTIRE FOREST OF GIANT TREES TURNS TO
dialogues.text: Kitai begins to cough.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Sir. I made it. I’m here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher pulls out of his reverie, still recovering from hi efforts.  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 81. He IGNORES his own condition, checking his SON’S SITUATIO He sees the GEOTHERMAL SURROUNDS. Sees his SON’S VITALS SCROLLING.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Make sure you have everything. Take your next inhaler. Your oxygen extraction is bottoming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai opens the med-kit. Kitai’s face changes. We see of five remaining vials, TWO HAVE BEEN BROKEN. Kitai quickly closes the case, hiding the contents from Cypher's view. Kitai’s face blanches at the realization. doesn’t have enough breathing fluid. Kitai is devastated.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Use the next dose of breathing fluid.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (straining not to cough) I'm good, Dad. I don't need it right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher looks at his son. The general radiates stillness.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Okay. And he continues to stoically watch Kitai.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 81A. 124

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai pauses. The weight of the world crashing down on hi His struggle for breath increases. He coughs. His chest m a hollow wheezing sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still Cypher says nothing. Just waiting. He watches stoic as Kitai’s struggles amplify. His coughing more brutal. T impossibility of life on earth without oxygen supplementa again becomes vividly clear. The medical computer compounds things -- telling Cypher: “ARTERIAL SHUNT 70% EFFECTIVE.” Cypher’s pallor is grey. He quickly realizes the SHUNT IS SLIPPING on the ragged e He sees FRESH BLOOD running down to the floor. * THE MEDICAL COMPUTER is telling him to COMMENCE TRANSFUSI Cypher needs FOUR UNITS OF O POSITIVE. * But all he cares about, all he can hear, is Kitai’s cough More brutal, now. The impossibility of life on earth with oxygen supplementation again becomes vividly clear. * Kitai’s face contorts with pain on the holographic screen

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three year-old Kitai marches around in pj’s and his fathe huge boots, struggling to hold Cypher’s cutlass.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Those lines are tight, son. Kitai beams with pride. Faia’s “CAPTURING” the home movie-- Kitai safe in his pj' hugs his father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The little boy straightens up and gives a salute. Revised Yellow 2/24/12

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: And now it’s time for one junior officer to head off to bed.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Noooo--

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: That’s a direct order from a superior officer, son. leans down and talks seriously to his son.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: We never disobey an order. Not at home, not when deployed.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Yes, sir!

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: And give your mother a kiss, tell her you love her. Cypher looks over at Faia.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: One day I’m just going to be ‘Kitai’s dad.’ Cypher 81B.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 82.

dialogues.text: Kitai slowly breaking down. Finally, reluctantly, he TAKE THE SECOND VIAL OF BREATHING FLUID. Rapidly, his oxygen n are met, his chest slows.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Count off remaining so you can keep track. Over. Kitai takes a long pause. His face flushed with shame.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (a painful lie) Four vials remain, sir. As A PACK OF WOLVES slinks past, finding a spot. Nearby D lie down to sleep. Magnificent BISON side by side with RESTING TIGERS. Kitai REALIZES ALL MANNER OF BEAST AND IN HAS SOUGHT THE SAME REFUGE as if in some kind of survival accord. At night, while the earth is frozen, it’s GAME OF Kitai stares at MONKEYS WITH BIOLUMINESCENT EYES. He ducks further back into the musty hollow of a rotting and the SKY OPENS with a downpour of biblical proportions unlike anything we've ever imagined. Kitai is miserable.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 83. 127

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai looks up from his shelter under the giant fallen tr He’s watching a BEE that has a leg caught in a SPIDER WEB The bee TUGS, pulling the gossamer thread, which sends a MESSAGE down the line...  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 84. A SPIDER, big as a fist, emerges, rushing down to the bee The spider darts in, laying another line. The bee tries t STING. The spider backs up. AS THE SKY STROBES, Kitai watches this battle, rapt. The BEE FIGHTS against the binding thread, which also see to ALERT THE SPIDER exactly to the bee’s location and strength. As THE BEE TIRES, the SPIDER CIRCLES CLOSER. The BEE STOPS BUZZING its wings. And the spider backs up, seemingly BLIND without the frantic thrashing of its prey Kitai’s face lit up, even more rapt, through the web. As spider begins carefully testing each thread for its tensi when the spider comes upon the thread upon which the bee rests, he makes ANOTHER ASSAULT -- The BEE AGAIN FLAILS WILDLY, pulling against its bond. Th spider comes in low, its own venomous fangs visible. The bee goes still again, ceasing to fight, and again the spider seems to become confused, backing up, testing the tension on the lines until it locates the bee again. The SEEMINGLY HELPLESS, EXHAUSTED BEE barely struggles, tracking the spider circling across its web. Then the HUG SPIDER CHARGES for the “kill.” The bee snaps to life, BUZZING UP, snapping the silky thr flying up and OVER THE SPIDER, sinking its STINGER into t SOFT, EXPOSED BACK of the spider. Stinging AGAIN AND AGAI then flying up and away, still held by a thread stuck to leg as if tethered... The POISONED SPIDER moves slowly, sluggishly, drunkenly t the middle of its web. The bee, which cannot get away and cannot land, is slowly exhausted, and DIES hanging from t thread. Kitai is in a kind of awe that exists beyond pity.

dialogues.speaker: KITALI
dialogues.text: Dad..? Dad --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher rouses from semi-consciousness. Cypher may not be if he himself is awake or in the past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 85.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: I’m here. SitRep?

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (VOICE THROUGH COMPUTER)
dialogues.text: How did you beat it? How did you first ghost? Tell me how you did it. Cypher stares at his son, so young in the eerie light. Cy begins matter-of-factly.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: I was at the original Nova Sea of Serenity, The Settlements. Everyone had gotten off safely. I was just out walking, I was taking a walk -- something you are never supposed to do -- and you know there’s those Novian centipedes... One dropped on my neck. I... I don’t like centipedes. At all. It startled me. Right at that moment an Ursa de- camo’s not more than five feet away. Looked like the canyon wall, if the canyon wall suddenly grabbed you and jumped really high in the air, I mean it was just Daydream. Centipede. Air. Then we’re in the river, we're rolling over and over underwater as it tries to crush me. Finally settling on the bottom. (beat) We don’t know much about Ursa at this point. Does it breathe oxygen? Can it swim? It’s on top of me and I can’t move. And everything just slows down. I see sunlight coming down through the water and I see my blood bubbling up. And I think that’s really pretty. And I think of Faia. She was pregnant with you, and close, too. Half-moon’s cycle away, maybe 23 days. She was so beautiful. (beat) And suddenly I knew one thing with perfect clarity and it obliterated all other thoughts: there was no way I was gonna die before I’d met my son, before I met you. (beat) And I realize it’s let go of me. And more than that I can tell it can’t find me. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: HHH HH HHH A HH HF HHH A HH HF HHH HF HH HF HH HH HH HF H
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 85A. 129 130

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It doesn’t even know where to look... See, I think we’re all just telling ourselves a story. And mine changed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai, deeply moved by what his father has just said, tak in the majesty of the geothermal safe zone. Animals all resting in close proximity to one another. Kitai, though exhausted, will not sleep this night. FADE TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE SINGLE SUN OF EARTH IS RISING SOMEWHERE. Kitai, eyes fighting sleep, watches the sun crack the horizon. As soo the light is up, so is Kitai. He takes his gear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

He almost gets it as ANOTHER GUST carr it through THICK VEGETATION. He brushes into the darker terrain, finally LUNGING -- Getting the PESKY PAPER. Then slowly LOOKING UP --

dialogues.speaker: BOOOOMMMMM

dialogues.text: Kitai carefully and methodically taps a combination into cutlass. The handle separates. THE CUTLASS FIBERS FORM TW PICKS - A FOOT-AND-A-HALF LONG. He begins to use the pick scale the steep hill.

dialogues.text: Negative.

dialogues.speaker: SUDDENLY
dialogues.text: He cocks his head in the listening position. The moment i tense. A SOUND. IT'S LIKE STATIC IN THE DISTANCE.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI
dialogues.text: I hear something. (listening) I think it's water. A lot of it.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)

dialogues.text: Kitai steps out of the thickness of the foliage. He pushe the last of the leaves with his hands. He emerges onto a rocky ledge. He connects the cutlass together. It contrac back to just the handle. He snaps it to his back. It stic magnetically. THE SOUND AROUND KITAI IS DEAFENING. Kitai's face registe the preternatural beauty before him. A WATERFALL - “THE ETERNAL FALLS" - THE LENGTH OF THE GRA

dialogues.speaker: SMASHED INTO EACH OTHER.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Roger. Food rations - half available... Flares - full... Med- kit - half available... breathing fluid- Kitai hesitates. Is he going to lie?

dialogues.speaker: KITAI

dialogues.text: Why aren’t you showing me the case? -Let me see it.

dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Why?  AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 90.

dialogues.text: Cadet, let me see the case. Beat. Kitai holds the case up. TWO VIALS REMAIN. SILENCE. Kitai waits for Cypher's response.

dialogues.text: Sir? A long beat. Finally --

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)

dialogues.text: What? Why?!

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: You lied to me!

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I was scared! I thought you would think I was stupid!

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: I told you to stop thinking! You’ve reached abort criteria. You need a minimum of three inhalers to make it to the tail. You've exhausted your resources. Abort mission. Kitai hangs his head. He looks out at The Falls.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I’ve got eighty percent. I could sky it --

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Come back to the ship, Cadet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revised Yellow 2/24/12 90A.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: An error in strategy on my part. I take full responsibility. Now, I gave you a direct order.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai begins pacing back and forth, very emotional --

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: An error in strategy? What error is that? Trusting me? Depending on me? Taking me with you? That error in strategy--

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Take a knee, Cadet. His pacing takes him closer to the edge.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I remember you happy. I remember being happy. And then, and then she’s gone, and you're never going to be happy again, never gonna be my dad again --

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Take a knee, Cadet! Kitai has gotten right up to the edge of the falls. The m the birds, the incredible ROAR of the water far, far belo

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I didn’t know what to do. I didn’t know. I... I... What did you want me to do?

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Nothing, you did the right thing. Now come back. Kitai whirling, yelling at his father, the heavens --

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Cadet --

dialogues.speaker: WHAT WAS I SUPPOSED TO DO
dialogues.text: LOSING IT, Kitai starts to cry, YELLING LOUDER --

dialogues.text: (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 92.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we see the House of Cypher split in two. In his delir the two sides of his nature are in stark battle.

dialogues.speaker: GENERAL
dialogues.text: Tell him the truth.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: GENERAL
dialogues.text: Tell him the truth!

dialogues.speaker: WAS I
dialogues.text: (beat)

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (softly) Yes. What Kitai has dreaded most, this truth.

dialogues.speaker: YES--
dialogues.text: And Cypher is now SNAPPING --

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 92A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai has heard said what he was most afraid of and it di kill him. And now he can say it --

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: And where were you? (beat) Where were you when my sister was killed? She called out for you. She called out your name, Dad. She called and you weren’t there... Because you’re never there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A sledgehammer blow back at Cypher. From his own son. No one’s ever said THAT out loud to him, the thing he was thinking, but could never say, his own great guilt and sh and he’s reeling and we’re slowly PUSHING on him as...

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER/FATHER
dialogues.text: He was only nine-- (General) He is a Raige! (father) A child-- What could he have done? (General) Fight! Exhaustion, pain, etched on Cypher’s entire being.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI, (VOICE THROUGH COMPUTER)
dialogues.text: Because somewhere there was something more important... What was it? You’ve never told me.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: (almost to himself) * My oath... * And suddenly it all just goes out of him and he’s spent -

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Come back to the ship. I’m sorry. * Nothing from Kitai. *  AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 93.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai standing there, hyperventilating from the emotion. CAMERA CIRCLING as he hears his father speak --

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: I gave you an order, Cadet.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: (beat) My name is Kitai! And this is my oath. He turns, TAKES TWO STEPS AND DIVES OFF THE CLIFF! Ground disappearing from under him in a DIZZYING MOVE-- And CYPHER MAY NOT EVEN REALIZE HE’S YELLING OUT --

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER, (VOICE THROUGH COMMUNICATOR)
dialogues.text: Kitai... NO --!! FOR A MOMENT - SUBLIME PEACE. Arms outstretched, body floating in the air--

dialogues.speaker: TURNS BLACK.
dialogues.text: He flies in a free-fall dive, INSANELY FAST PAST ROCK WAL OVER LEDGES -- OUT OVER THE DAPPLING RIVER BELOW, his fac rippling from the force of the wind -- IT’S AWESOME-- THE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher sees something that we do not.  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 94. 148 149 150 151

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher tries to get out of his seat. CYPHER SCREAMS AND I FORCED BACK DOWN. He winces through his terror and agony stares at the screen.

dialogues.speaker: THEN
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 95. SLAM TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: WE ARE IN NOVA PRIME IN THE RAIGE LIVING STRUCTURE.
dialogues.text: Two official-looking men knock on the door. Faia answers. They say something and step inside. * WE DO NOT HEAR WHAT THEY SAY AS THEY SPEAK TO FAIA. She * begins screaming. They bow their heads as she screams in despair. * The two official-looking men continue to look away as Fai cries. *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai slowly comes to. He feels SOMETHING. A soft PECKING his cheek. He brushes at it with a hand. His eyes open TO FIND he’s looking at a NEWBORN BABY BIRD, easily three fe tall, NUZZLING AT HIM from an INCH AWAY. Kitai jumps back. Realizes he’s covered in something. It clear and liquidy. He belches for breath and begins wipin off. The first thing he can make out is the PATCHWORK OF

dialogues.speaker: LIGHT AROUND HIM. THERE ARE PATTERNS OF LIGHT MADE BY THE
dialogues.text: GAPS BETWEEN THE INTERTWINED BRANCHES ALL AROUND HIM. The baby bird is making an I’m hungry sound to him. He slowly turns, noticing there are FOUR-FOOT EGG-LIKE SH IN THE STRUCTURE WITH HIM. And THEY HAVE ALL BEGUN TO CRA More DARK-LOOKING NEWBORN CREATURES - THEIR SLICK WINGS OPENING AND FOLDING INTO THE AIR. Kitai looks down. He can see through the bottom of the structure through the gaps in the branches - WHOA - HERDS

dialogues.speaker: BENEATH US... ONE-HUNDRED-AND-FIFTY FEET BELOW
dialogues.text: There is an opening in the structure of branches. Kitai c see an enormous tree branch extending back to an enormous tree. On the branch at the base of the tree limb is a MAS

dialogues.speaker: AT THE END OF THE BRANCH.
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 95A. Kitai takes in everything. Eyes darting around. Kitai looks around and sees his backpack torn in the corn Clipped to it is his cutlass. Kitai starts moving slowly towards his cutlass. The newbo creatures in the egg-shapes start breaking free of their eggs. Kitai reaches the gear. Kitai looks down below and sees a DARK SHAPE MOVING UP TH TRUNK OF THE TREE. He can’t make out what it is. One of the NEWBORN CREATURES MOVES TOWARDS HIM. Kitai pus it away with his foot. It falls on its side, almost comically.

dialogues.speaker: BRANCH.
dialogues.text: He unclips the cutlass with trembling hands. HE TAPS IN A

dialogues.speaker: ONE END HAS A SHARP SPEAR POINT. THE OTHER A FLAT BLADE.
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 96. THE LIMB SUDDENLY SHAKES VIOLENTLY. He sees through the opening in the structure THE MASSIVE

dialogues.speaker: CONDOR-LIKE CREATURE FIGHTING WITH A GREY LEOPARD-LIKE BE
dialogues.text: Kitai can see glimpses of them attacking each other outsi This is Kitai’s moment. He has a clear shot to jump to th branch below and escape. But just then, Kitai senses A SHADOW. THE BRANCH SHAKES.

dialogues.speaker: LIKE CREATURES SCALING THE BOTTOM OF THE STRUCTURE.
dialogues.text: Kitai looks back at the newborns in the corner of the nes They SQUAWK at him. Beat. Kitai moves back into the nest stands in front of them. A HUGE LEOPARD CREATURE’S FOREARM BURSTS BETWEEN THE BRAN AND JUST MISSES KITAI. CREATURES’ PAWS REACH THROUGH THE BRANCHES EVERYWHERE. ON THE NEWBORN CONDOR-LIKE CREATURES GETS STRUCK.

dialogues.speaker: FALLS WITH IT TO THE GROUND BELOW.
dialogues.text: OTHER SECTIONS OF THE STRUCTURE CRACK OFF. ALL THAT’S LEF THE BOWL OF THE STRUCTURE.

dialogues.speaker: CREATURES .
dialogues.text: KITAI STABS THE LEOPARD-LIKE CREATURE’S ARM WITH HIS CUTL IT REELS BACK IN PAIN AND CLIMBS BACK OVER THE EDGE.

dialogues.speaker: MORE LEOPARD CREATURES TRY TO CRAWL IN. KITAI SPINS HIS
dialogues.text: CUTLASS, SLICING ONE OF THE CREATURES’ PAWS.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Leave them alone!

dialogues.speaker: INTO THE EARTH FAR BELOW.
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12

dialogues.speaker: THE MASSIVE CONDOR DIVES OFF THE EDGE OF THE STRUCTURE.
dialogues.text: Kitai is unable to unclench his hands from the cutlass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai climbs down the tree trunk. He carries his gear and cutlass on his back. He lands on the ground and sees in the foliage the massiv condor-like creature hovered over the bodies of a few of newborns. The massive condor-like creature raises its hea and SCREAMS FEROCIOUSLY.

dialogues.speaker: CREATURE TOUCHES ITS HEAD TO ITS LIFELESS NEWBORNS AND TH
dialogues.text: RAISES ITS HEAD AND SCREAMS AGAIN, Kitai looks at the creature again, and we see something SHIFTING IN HIM. He recognizes that sound, that loss. Kitai backs up into the jungle and slips away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai checks his Navi-band. His countenance changes --

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Come on, no! 153 154

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 97A. Kitai looks around, PANICKED. All alone. His lifesuit has turned orange. He RUNS through the dense jungle, speeding scrambling, CRASHING THROUGH, trying to GAIN ALTITUDE to CATCH THE SUN before it VANISHES.  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 CAMERA CLOSE on his shoulder as he BREAKS PASSES THROUGH

dialogues.speaker: FINALLY SKIDDING TO A STOP.
dialogues.text: Kitai looks up and sees the RUINS OF A DAM. The sight is confusing to him. A SHADOW PASSES OVER HIM. Kitai looks up and sees the DESCENDANT OF A CONDOR CLIPPI THE TOPS OF TREES, FLYING RECKLESSLY, ANGRILY. It’s scary but could also be a form of self-flagellation, of guilt a sadness over the loss of its chicks. Then it ROCKETS stra up TOWARD THE SUN. Its every movement displaying ANGER ov its loss. Kitai can see his breath; the temperature is dropping rapidly. He also sees in the bird's recklessness in the aftermath of grief an echo of his own youth. He steadies himself, GETS CONTROL, a NEW KITAI emerging, one who is n angriest that he didn’t get the lesson sooner. Tired, and lost, he begins running in the same direction the giant bird.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai sprinting raggedly, looking for shelter. The sun dr like a stone in the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher, in pain and physical exhaustion, driven only by concern for his son, works ALL OF THE PROBE CAMERAS SIMULTANEOUSLY. Images BLASTING AT HIM.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Come on. Where are you? ALL MANNER OF EARTH TERRAIN, SCANNED IN BLINKS OF AN EYE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 99. 158 159 160

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE PLANTS BEGIN TO CLOSE. The night frost is upon us. Ki looks left, then right. Nothing. We feel his doom. Then he sees A SMALL HOG-LIKE CREATURE running along. Kit notices the hog-like creature seems neither worried nor l So he FOLLOWS it, using all his agility and quickness, un bushes, over piles of rocks, around tree trunks -- He sees it burrow into a hole in the ground as THREE SMAL HOG-LIKE CREATURES follow it into the hole. As a WALL OF ICY NIGHT CRACKS ACROSS THE LANDSCAPE TOWARD HIM, Kitai doesn’t hesitate at all. He follows them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai, frost forming over his body, uses a flat stone he found to dig. He digs frantically at the hole the hog jus entered. Finally he is able to slide his body into it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai slides thirty feet down to a soft grassy surface. P BLACK. Kitai hits an area on his lifesuit. A LIGHT ON HIS

dialogues.speaker: SHOULDER. THE FABRIC THERE ACTUALLY GLOWING.
dialogues.text: KITAI sees this hog hole is actually a cave of smooth sto walls. Kitai moves between the narrow walls. THE LIGHT FR

dialogues.speaker: VARIOUS ANIMALS IN NATURE.
dialogues.text: Despite the crudeness there is a beauty and majesty to th place. Kitai takes in all the paintings as he tries to ca his breath.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI HEARS A NOISE.
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Yellow 2/24/12 100.

dialogues.speaker: FLIES AWAY WITH THE LIMP CARCASS.
dialogues.text: Kitai moves closer toward the warmth of the tiny rivulet lava. He finds a good spot, cutlass at the ready, ever watchful. Kitai tries to settle his mind, but can’t. He i shaking. Gradually the light of the lifesuit dims and goe out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Delirious, Cypher searches for Kitai. Rapidly scrolling P IMAGES. Nothing. Nothing. Cypher wants nothing but to fin his son. PROBE after PROBE is empty. He thinks he sees hi a screen. NO. An apparition in his mind. He’s lost his so LOST HIM. And he breaks. Just breaks from the weight of i Both of his children sacrificed to the Raige altar. And h hears the voice of the GENERAL seemingly behind him --

dialogues.speaker: GENERAL'S VOICE
dialogues.text: Stop it. Cypher’s crying. Can’t control his shaking.

dialogues.speaker: STOP IT
dialogues.text: Cypher can’t or won’t stop it. His tear-streaked, loss- wracked face turns and for a moment he sees that stern im of himself, of the General and they STARE AT EACH OTHER a beat until the General disappears and Cypher, the father, turns back to the search for his boy.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: Come on, come on! Where are you? Cypher slowly hits the cockpit recorder.  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 101.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: General Cypher Raige. The mission with Cadet Kitai Raige was a failure. Beat. Cypher looks down. When he looks up he is no longer General.

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: This is a message for my wife. Faia, it’s Cypher. Our son’s alive out there. I can’t find him. (beat) I don’t know what to do. Cypher’s eyes, the eyes of a father, begin to fill with tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai’s cutlass sits on the ground. The camera slow pans across his gear. WE SEE ONLY ONE VIAL OF BREATHING FLUID REMAINS. We hear a sort of scratching sound. It stops. REVEAL: Kitai has been inspired by the cave paintings. He drawn a huge map of his own... His entire journey. Comple with labels. “DAD” - “BABOONS” - “RIVER” - “WATERFALLS” - “NEST” - “I AM HERE, I THINK.” The words “TAIL SOMEWHERE HERE” are marked by a huge area on the left side of the m He’s working out a plan. Kitai gets distracted as he sees the hog family starting leave the cave. Kitai quickly gathers his things and foll them out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai comes to the surface and emerges. The mother pig looks back as if to say “you’re welcome.” huge shadow falls over him. The DESCENDANT OF A CONDOR circles overhead. Kitai clutches his cutlass, looks to th dangerous bird above, and begins walking south. We see da circles under his eyes.  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 102. 164 165 166 The CONDOR CIRCLES OVERHEAD. Kitai checks his cutlass and begins walking south, NAVIGATING BY A TOPOGRAPHICAL FEATU he also sketched in the Cave of Man’s Prehistory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai hurrying best he can, now looking like one of those Ultra-Marathoners at the end of a three-day race. He glan up and barely catches the STREAKING FIGURE OF THE DESCEND OF A CONDOR SWOOPING BEHIND A CLUSTER OF TREES. He holds up his cutlass wearily and ducks behind some thi trees to stay hidden as he moves.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Leave me alone!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai lumbering along, all former spryness exhausted, com to a dead stop. Sitting on a branch up in the canopy of t is THE MASSIVE CONDOR-LIKE CREATURE. The creature is obsc by branches, but it is unmistakably watching him. It is a unmistakably LISTLESS. Moving rapidly through the cycles grief, the descendant of the condor is in DEPRESSION. * Kitai holds his cutlass and walks by calmly. It stares do eerily. As Kitai passes, he starts to run. Then slows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai walks painfully. He is very tired and clearly fadin THEN THE GROUND BEGINS TO SHAKE. Kitai looks around, confused.

dialogues.speaker: CAUGHT IN THE STAMPEDE.
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 102A.

dialogues.speaker: HOOVES ALMOST CRUSH HIM.
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 103. HE LOSES HIS FATHER’S CUTLASS. IT GETS CRUSHED AND BROKEN UNDER THE HOOVES OF THE CREATURES.

dialogues.speaker: AROUND, NOT KNOWING WHAT JUST HAPPENED.
dialogues.text: His eyes catch movement in the trees. He sees the DESCEND

dialogues.speaker: THE TREES FAR ABOVE HIM.
dialogues.text: Kitai stares up at it, eyes still wild with adrenaline. H moves his neck from side to side to alleviate the pain fr the fall. THE MASSIVE CONDOR CREATURE MOVES ITS NECK FROM SIDE TO SIDE. Kitai becomes still. Stares at the creature above him. He moves his head again side-to-side - this time intentional THE CONDOR CREATURE MIMICS HIM AGAIN. Kitai nods his than and it’s clear, whether he’s aware of it or not, that Kit is growing, changing, interacting very differently. He backpedals slowly into the jungle, turns, and hurries

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai approaches the banks of a river. His lifesuit is orange. He immediately dumps his gear in exhaustion. He fumbles with his breathing fluid case. Almost passes out.  AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 103A. Then stares at the LAST VIAL. Finally, he takes the last fluid that allows his survival.  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 104. 168 169 Kitai sits for a moment. He’s so tired. He could just giv up. So easily. Then he sees a log floating by in the rive He stares at it. He sees a group of fallen trees by the river's edge. He struggles to his feet and starts cutting long vines that are hanging from the trees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai pulls a small raft tied by vines to the edge of the river. He pushes it in and quickly jumps on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai is lying on his back on the raft made of several lo The river is teeming with life. Kitai stands in the cente the makeshift raft, using a long branch as an oar. THEN: A FORTY-FOOT ANACONDA SWIMS ALONGSIDE THE RAFT. Kitai holds his breath for what seems like forever. The s quietly passes. There is thick, lush jungle on either sid It bends and reaches out over the river. Kitai relaxes into this gentle moment of calm. He lies do on his back. The tiny poetic figure of Kitai floating sou through the breathtaking landscape. Kitai is completely drained and fatigued. He takes this opportunity to close his eyes for the first time in nearl twenty-four hours. A symphony of the sounds of life act a haunting lullaby as Kitai... DRIFTS OFF TO SLEEP. A hand reaches out and touches him. GIRL’S VOICE (0.S.) Wake up. Kitai opens his eyes. Senshi sits on the raft with him. H hair hangs to one side. She strokes his face gently. He l up and smiles at his big sister.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: It’s time for you to wake up.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Hey. He stares at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 105.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I was just about to come out that day.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: No you weren't. But you did the right thing.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Dad says I should have tried.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: He’s just mad at himself. That’s all.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Why couldn’t you ghost? She stares down at him. She touches his face again.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: You're close right now.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I am?

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: Are you scared?

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: No. I’m tired.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: That’s good. You filled your heart with something else. Now you’ve got to get up. He looks up at her.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: I memorized some of Moby Dick.

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: Kitai, get up.

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: “All that most maddens and torments; all that stirs up the lees of things;" --

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: Kitai wake up. It’s time for you to wake up.  AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 106. Kitai covers his ears a little bit --

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: “All truth with malice in it --”

dialogues.speaker: SENSHI
dialogues.text: Kitai, wake up --

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: “All that cracks the sinews and cakes the brain;” Senshi looks down, resigned. Her hair covers her face. Wh she looks up suddenly, HER FACE IS MANGLED AND BLEEDING F THE ATTACK. SHE YELLS THROUGH HER MUTILATED FACE.

dialogues.speaker: KITAI SNAPS AWAKE, DISORIENTED. THE FREEZE-OVER IS IN EFF
dialogues.text: THE RIVER IS HALF-FROZEN. The raft is up against a riverb The jungle is turning gray. The rough gray undersides of plants become a carapace against the cold. Kitai looks around. He has lost a deadly amount of time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai sprints madly. FROST FORMS ON HIS UPPER LIP AND ATO HIS HEAD. HIS LIFESUIT IS YELLOW. ICE FORMS ON THE PLANTS AND TREES AROUND HIM. Kitai struggles to keep moving... ICE IS FORMING ON HIS LIFESUIT.

dialogues.speaker: UP AHEAD, BRANCHES BEGIN SNAPPING. SHRUBBERY FALLING TO T
dialogues.text: GROUND. Kitai is shivering violently, his arms wrapped ar himself. Up ahead... THE DESCENDENT OF A CONDOR IS HIGH IN THE TRE

dialogues.speaker: FIFTY FEET TO THE GROUND.
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Pink 1/26/12 107. 172 The jungle floor begins to freeze. Kitai collapses to his knees. His face hits the hard, cold ground. ICE FORMS ON EYELIDS. HIS FACE TURNING BLUE. His vision failing. SERIES OF SURREAL, BLURRY, BARELY VISIBLE IMAGES. -KITAI SEES CLAWS DIGGING AT THE EARTH. -THE ENTIRE JUNGLE TURNS TO ICE. -KITAI’S LIFESUIT HAS TURNED BLACK. * SUDDENLY, THE CONDOR CREATURE ATTACKS.

dialogues.speaker: IS STILL QUITE COLD.
dialogues.text: Kitai gets to his feet. He looks around bewildered. Turns

dialogues.speaker: KITAL
dialogues.text: Hey. (tapping her again) Thanks. But she does not move. Kitai realizes that: She has frozen to death. Kitai stands silently. Staring. Unable to move. Moments o heavy silence, then he turns and moves solemnly into the jungle.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 108. 173 174

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The subtle trail Kitai has been on has led to water. He emerges from the foliage, clearly at one with nature. He to the EDGE OF THE POOL, leans down, cups his hands, and drinks steadily... Kitai glances over and SLOWLY WIDEN TO REVEAL a GROUP OF OKAPI drinking their fill. Kitai silently acknowledges th mutual rights. And as WE WIDEN FURTHER, REVEAL to the oth side a LIONESS and CUBS at the water. KITAI IS AT ONE WITH HIS SURROUNDINGS. In the water’s reflection, Kitai catches his NEW VISAGE, and what he see SELF-KNOWLEDGE looking back at him, a new creature himsel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai searches the terrain. He is looking for something. does not find it and continues on. He is experiencing lab breathing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai moves through tall grass. He clears his throat. His breathing fluid is wearing off. A slight cough. Then wors It comes on suddenly, escalating rapidly as the remaining breathing fluid wears off from his system. He has real trouble catching his breath. It gets worse st He DROPS TO HIS KNEES. And at that moment, SOMETHING catches his eye, something SHINY. He crawls toward it -- A JAGGED PIECE OF OFF-WHITE. NUMBERS STENCILED ON IT. The word, “Hesper” appears. Kitai reaches down and picks up the foot-and-a-half piece ship. Kitai runs excitedly forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 108A. 177

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai runs as well as he can with his dwindling oxygen. I like he’s being squeezed inside invisible plastic wrap as lungs fight for air. His coughing is very frequent now. H passes ANOTHER PIECE OF SHIP and ANOTHER... He comes to a wiry, strange-looking tree. He climbs aggressively. He makes his way to the top and peers out o the dense jungle shrubbery and sees: THE ENORMOUS TAIL OF THE CARGO SHIP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 109. 178 179 180 181 The tail section has scorched an open flat of jungle terr Kitai leaps from the tree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai struggles forward UP THE HILL FOR THE TAIL. He is coughing and wheezing uncontrollably. With every step the BEAUTIFUL STRUCTURE becomes MORE VISIBLE. But he STUMBLES FALLING to the ground. He’s ONE HUNDRED YARDS from the ta He clutches his chest. He is choking. He uses his sleeve cover his mouth as he stands and moves toward the tail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai is dizzy. His breath coming in torn strips. His fac red, his chest heaving... as he desperately RUMMAGES thro debris. He goes to where the MED-KIT should be -- IT’S NO THERE. He’s about to LOSE CONSCIOUSNESS. Whirling, light dark MERGING -- His EYE CATCHES -- in the chaos and clutter -- A MED-KIT, half-shredded. He falls beside it, feebly tearing into it searching, FINALLY FINDING -- AN ENTIRE PACK OF BREATHING FLUID. He fumbles and awkward ingests an inhaler. Pauses. Catches his breath. Then immediately ingests a second inhaler. Falls onto his back His chest HEAVING FOR AS MUCH PRECIOUS OXYGEN AS IT CAN G
AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 110.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cypher is slumped in his chair. His skin is gray. He move his head in delirium. His eyes are half-closed. * SLOWLY REVEAL a MASSIVE AMOUNT OF BLOOD LOSS. All around We see on the MED-SCREEN THAT ALL OF CYPHER’S BLOOD LEVEL

dialogues.speaker: UREA NITROGEN AND MYOGLOBIN LEVELS ARE OFF THE CHARTS.
dialogues.text: The ARTERIAL SHUNT has FAILED PERMANENTLY. The COMPUTER c do nothing but RECOMMEND IMMEDIATE MEDICAL TRANSPORT. * He glances at this message. IMMEDIATE MEDICAL TRANSPORT. Given the extreme unlikelihood of this coming to pass, Cy is out of options. He continues to live by sheer willpowe alone. *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitai has located the second beacon. He places it in posi and we hear THE HEARTWARMING WHIR OF THE BEACON CYCLING A SIGNALING A READY ALERT. Kitai sees a set of Cutlass C-40s locked against a wall i storage compartment. He moves towards it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: DOESN’T KNOW WHERE KITAI IS. The technician turns to look at Kitai as he passes, stari in awe at the FOURTEEN YEAR-OLD GHOST walking by him. dialogues.text: (to the medics) ...Stand me up. Cypher’s legs are in braces. The medics look at Cypher. 237 238 239 240  AFTER EARTH Revised Blue (on White) 1/20/12 129. 241 242

dialogues.speaker: CYPHER
dialogues.text: I said, stand me up! Cypher starts to sit up. The medics quickly rush to him. help him swing the braces to the ground. They carry him u each arm as he rises off the medical cot. His bandaged fe touching the floor of the ship is painful to watch. The medics bear as much of Cypher’s weight as they can. Cypher straightens up and stares at his son. Cypher bring his hand up and salutes his son. Father and son stare deeply. Kitai salutes back. Profound connection rages between them. Kitai approaches and gentl hugs his father. Kitai whispers in his ear.

dialogues.text: It is raining outside. THE RAIN HITS THE EXTERIOR OF THE RESCUE SHIP. THE RESCUE SHIP RISES FROM THE GROUND IN THIS RAIN STORM. RISES HIGHER AND HIGHER INTO THE AIR.
